property_description:
Description of object:
We offer a one-bedroom apartment for sale in the Lazur 1 complex, Sveti Vlas, Bulgaria.


Lazur 1 was built in the eastern part of Sveti Vlas. Nearby, you will find shops, pharmacies, restaurants, banks, and other essential infrastructure. The complex offers owners and guests access to amenities such as:



  

Swimming pool;

  

Summer garden;

  

Café;

  

Shops;

  

Playground;

  

Parking;

  

24-hour security.


The apartment is 66 m² and is located on the second floor of the complex. It consists of: an entrance hall, a living room with a kitchen and dining area, a bedroom, a bathroom with a shower, and a terrace overlooking the well-maintained grounds of the complex. The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with all necessary appliances.


Service fee - 600 EUR/year.


Price - 117,000 euros.

Fixture and fittings:
Lazur 1 is an accommodation in Sveti Vlas, Bulgaria, offering its guests a variety of amenities and facilities. Here are some features of Lazur 1:



  

Rooms: The accommodation has spacious and comfortable rooms with air conditioning, TV, and an en-suite bathroom with a shower or bathtub.

  

Kitchen: There is a fully equipped kitchen in the accommodation, allowing guests to prepare and enjoy meals.

  

Living Room: The accommodation features a spacious living room with comfortable sofas and a TV.

  

Dining Area: There is a dining area where guests can have their meals.

  

Balcony: Each room has a balcony with sea views, where guests can relax and enjoy the scenery.

  

Pool: The accommodation has an outdoor pool with sun loungers and umbrellas, where guests can swim and sunbathe.

  

Garden: The property offers a beautiful garden with garden furniture and loungers for guests to unwind and bask in the sun.

  

Wi-Fi: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for guests.

  

Parking: There is parking for guests arriving by car.


Overall, Lazur 1 provides a cozy and comfortable accommodation for a relaxing holiday in Sveti Vlas.

Location:
Lazur 1 is an accommodation in Sveti Vlas, a coastal town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The property is located in a quiet and picturesque area, about 400 meters from the beach. Guests can easily reach the sandy beach of Sveti Vlas on foot and spend the day by the sea or stroll along the waterfront.


Near Lazur 1, there are various restaurants, bars, and shops that are within walking distance. The yacht harbor of Sveti Vlas is also nearby, where guests can take boat trips or sailing excursions. The old town of Nessebar, which is a UNESCO World Heritage site, is about 10 km away and can be reached by bus or taxi.


Burgas Airport is approximately 35 km away and offers connections to many European cities. Guests can arrange a transfer from the airport to the accommodation or rent a car to explore the area.


Overall, the location of Lazur 1 provides a peaceful and relaxing stay near the beach and local amenities, while surrounding towns and attractions are easily accessible.

Description of object:
We offer a large, two-story house for sale in the village of Kosharitsa, Sunny Beach, Bulgaria. The village is located on the southern slope of the East Balkan Mountains, at the foot of the Stara Planina mountain range. The area is famous for its beautiful nature, tranquility, and clean air, surrounded by sea and mountains, away from the hustle and bustle of the city but only a 5-minute drive from the entertainment center. The region has developed infrastructure: shops, restaurants, cafes, a bus stop, a church, post office, administration, school, kindergarten, pharmacy, and more.

The house has an area of 350 sqm and is situated in the center of the village. On the ground floor: entrance hall, 2 bathrooms, workshop-storage room, three separate rooms, living room with kitchen and dining area, and 3 terraces. On the second floor there is a large corridor - entrance hall, 2 bedrooms, an office, a living room with a fireplace, a dining room, a kitchen-bar, a bathroom, a laundry room and three terraces.

The house is on an individual plot of land measuring 800 sqm. There is a parking space with a roof cover, a relaxation area under shady kiwi trees, a playground and a fertile well-maintained garden with another playground for children. A summer kitchen with barbecue has been built behind the house according to plan.

The house is completely move-in ready and equipped with all necessary furniture and appliances. Installed: alarm system, television, internet. Heating: air jacket fireplace with radiators and air conditioning units. Water supply, electricity and sewage are centralized.

Fixture and fittings:
The house is completely furnished and has everything needed for long-term living. The furniture is in good condition.

The house, with an area of 350 square meters, is located in the center of the village and consists of two separate floors. On the ground floor: entrance hall, 2 bathrooms, workshop-storage, three separate rooms, living room with kitchen and dining area, and 3 terraces. On the second floor, there is a large corridor - an entrance hall, 2 bedrooms, an office, a living room with a fireplace, a dining room, a kitchen with a bar, a bathroom, a laundry room, and three terraces.

The house is situated on an individual plot of land measuring 800 square meters. It includes a covered parking area, a recreational area under a shady kiwi tree, a playground, and a fertile, well-maintained garden with another playground for children. A summer kitchen with a grill was built behind the house according to plan.

The house is completely move-in ready and equipped with all necessary furniture and appliances. Installed: alarm system, television, internet. Heating: air-duct fireplace with radiators, air conditioning units. Water supply, electricity, and sewage are central.

Location:
Kosharitsa is a small village on the Black Sea coast of Bulgaria, near Sunny Beach and Nessebar. It is located about 4 km inland, providing a quieter alternative to the bustling coastal towns.

The village has a picturesque setting with many hills and green forests. There are several restaurants, cafes, and shops in the village, as well as a church and an elementary school.

Kosharitsa is also a popular destination for tourists who want to enjoy nature and tranquility. There are many hiking and biking trails in the area, as well as attractions such as the Kaliakra Fortress and the historical center of Nessebar.

In recent years, Kosharitsa has also become an attractive destination for purchasing holiday properties, with many new apartment complexes and villas being developed in the area.

Description of object:
An attractive house, built in the picturesque area of Lahana in Sarafovo, offers coziness and comfort combined with exceptional landscapes. With a spacious private courtyard of 360 square meters, this property provides ample space and opportunities for outdoor relaxation.

On the first floor, there is a spacious living room, an ideal space for family gatherings and entertainment. The kitchen area is conveniently integrated into the living room, providing practicality and functionality. The veranda with access to the yard allows you to enjoy fresh air and natural beauty year-round. Additionally, on this floor, there is a storage room, a comfortable toilet, and stairs.

On the second floor, privacy and comfort are provided with three bedrooms. One of the bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and a dressing room, offering comfort and luxury to the owners. Two terraces with stunning views of Burgas and the sea add another layer of enjoyment to the stay.

The house is south-facing, ensuring maximum use of solar energy throughout the day. The property is located only 7 minutes from the center of Burgas, in a low-rise area, where each house enjoys the possibility of a sea view. High-quality building materials are used, combined with a modern style, ensuring elegance and durability.

Payment Method:

30% upon construction site opening
30% upon completion of the rough construction works
20% for carpentry, interior plastering, and screeds
10% for the facade until May 2025
10% upon Act 16


Location:
Sarafovo is a charming district in the city of Burgas, Bulgaria. It is known for its pleasant seaside atmosphere, modern amenities, and convenient location near Burgas Airport. Here are some key points about Sarafovo:

Sarafovo is located on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, about 10 kilometers northeast of the center of Burgas. It lies near the Bay of Burgas, offering beautiful sea views and a relaxed coastal environment.

Tourism plays a significant role in Sarafovo's economy. The district attracts visitors with its sandy beaches, clean sea, and family-friendly atmosphere. Many tourists choose Sarafovo for its quieter ambiance compared to the busier central areas of Burgas.

Sarafovo is an attractive coastal district that combines modern living with the charm of a seaside village. Its convenient location near Burgas Airport, beautiful beaches, and growing amenities make it an appealing destination for both living and visiting.

The surroundings of Burgas are also of great archaeological interest, as there are numerous ancient sites in the region.

Aleksandrovo may be a quiet and idyllic place characterized by traditional agriculture and rural life. It could be a location especially suitable for travelers seeking an authentic experience off the beaten tourist paths. Like most places in Bulgaria, visitors will likely encounter friendly locals and have the opportunity to enjoy Bulgarian culture, cuisine, and hospitality.

property_description:
Description of object:
We offer you a 2-room apartment for sale in the prestigious gated community "Kaliakria Resort" in the village of Topola.

Main features:

- Area: 92.23 sqm
- Floor: Ground floor of 4
- Layout: Spacious living room with dining area and kitchen, one bedroom, bathroom with toilet, laundry room, entrance hall, and terrace.
- Condition: Furnished and equipped with appliances.

Fixture and fittings:
We present to you a 2-room apartment in the Kaliakria Resort complex, Topola region, Dobrich, Bulgaria. The living room features a couch, coffee table, decorations, air conditioning, lamps, TV, cabinets, dining table, chairs, and curtains. The integrated kitchen includes an oven, ceramic cooktop, extractor hood, and refrigerator. The bedroom is equipped with a double bed, wardrobe, lamps, and curtains. You have access to the terrace with a view of the pool from both the living room and bedroom. The bathroom is designed as a shower room.

Location:
The Kaliakria resort is located in the picturesque village of Topola, in the Dobrich region, on the northern Bulgarian Black Sea coast. This luxurious resort is known for its prime location, which offers a perfect blend of tranquility, nature, and amenities.

**Location Advantages:**
**Panoramic Sea View:**  
The resort is situated on a hill, providing spectacular views of the Black Sea coast and the surrounding cliff landscapes. Many apartments and villas have direct views of the picturesque Kaliakria Bay.

**Proximity to Golf Courses:**  
Kaliakria is near three renowned golf courses, including Thracian Cliffs Golf & Beach Resort, BlackSeaRama Golf & Villas, and Lighthouse Golf & Spa Resort. This makes the resort a paradise for golf enthusiasts.

**Access to the Sea:**  
The coast and beaches are just a few minutes away. Nearby, there are several small coves with clear water and calm beaches, perfect for relaxation and water sports.

**Natural Surroundings:**  
The resort is surrounded by green hills and scenic hiking trails ideal for walking and cycling. The region is known for its unspoiled nature and fresh air.

**Accessibility:**  
Topola is strategically located between the towns of Balchik (approximately 10 km away) and Kavarna (approximately 6 km away), both easily accessible by car. The nearest major city, Dobrich, is about 50 km away, and Varna International Airport is approximately 65 km distant.

**Infrastructure:**  
Although the resort is quietly situated, there are numerous restaurants, shops, and services in the vicinity. The proximity to the towns of Kavarna and Balchik provides access to further cultural, culinary, and commercial offerings.

**Attractions in the Area:**  
Nearby attractions include the Botanical Garden and Palace of Balchik, Cape Kaliakra, as well as nature reserves and traditional villages that make the region unique.

**Summary:**  
The location of the Kaliakria resort in Topola offers an exceptional combination of luxury, breathtaking views, access to high-quality leisure options, and a peaceful natural environment. It is ideal for those seeking relaxation and an upscale lifestyle in one of Bulgaria's most beautiful regions.

Miscellaneous:
If you have questions about this property or would like to schedule a viewing, please feel free to contact us using the provided contact information.

Description of object:
We exclusively offer a large 4-room penthouse apartment in the Privilege Fort complex in Elenite on the Black Sea.

The apartment is located on the fifth floor of building B in the Privilege Fort complex. It features a spacious living room with an integrated kitchen and beautiful sea views, three bedrooms, and two bathrooms with showers! The entire apartment is surrounded by a U-shaped terrace with stunning and unobstructed sea views!

The "Privilege Fort Beach" complex is located near the Elenite resort, in a picturesque bay at Robinson beach. Surrounded by the sea and pine forests, the complex offers a rare and extremely healthy combination of sea and mountain climate.

The beautiful sandy beach, nearby water park, supermarket, taxi, and bus service make the complex an ideal place for a summer holiday on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. At "Privilege Fort Beach," you will find everything you need for a comfortable and relaxing vacation with your family! You and your children can enjoy the pools, jacuzzi, and the artificial river flowing through the complex. All pools are equipped with lifeguards, and the sun loungers around the pools are free of charge.

In addition to the magnificent swimming pools and beautiful green areas, there are four children's playgrounds, fitness, beauty and massage center outdoors, medical center, supermarket, fitness, sauna, pizza restaurant, "Ship - Bar-Restaurant" with panoramic views, free parking for owners and guests, tennis/football court.

Owners pay an annual maintenance and management fee of EUR13.20 (including 20% VAT) per square meter of the total area of the apartment. This fee covers:

- maintenance of the complex territory; - maintenance of common parts of buildings; - maintenance and repair of infrastructure and communications; - maintenance of swimming pools; - care for the greenery of the complex; - year-round security; - use of swimming pools; - electric lighting of common territories; - electric lighting of the common areas of the building; - a unique "Fort Noks Guarantee" program offers a non-expiring warranty on most elements of finishing and materials in all apartments.

The complexes are designed for comfortable year-round living. At the reception, you will find a variety of paid services - everything you need during your stay in Bulgaria:

- year-round cleaning of apartments; - apartment repairs; - payment of current bills for the apartment / taxes, electricity, water, etc./; - car rental; - furnishing of apartments; - use of fitness club, tennis court, sauna, beauty center, medical services; - cable TV and telephone; - other services required by owners for a comfortable stay in the complexes.

Fixture and fittings:
The apartment has a stunning view, but unfortunately, the laminate and furniture have aged a bit. They are still usable, but a complete renovation is recommended, including new laminate flooring, kitchen replacement, and a fresh coat of paint! Our client has unfortunately used the apartment very little and has no intention of undertaking significant renovations. The asking price is even less than the purchase price from many years ago!



Location:
Elenite is a well-known resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. Here are some details about Elenite, Bulgaria:

Location: Elenite is situated on the eastern coast of Bulgaria by the Black Sea. It is about 10 kilometers north of Sunny Beach, one of the country's most popular resorts, and approximately 40 kilometers northeast of Burgas, a larger city and important transport hub.

Resort Concept: Elenite is primarily known as an all-inclusive resort. This means that many hotels and accommodations in the area offer package deals that include lodging, meals, drinks, and often entertainment and activities. This concept is especially popular with families and tourists seeking a relaxing beach holiday.

Beaches: Elenite boasts beautiful sandy beaches that gently slope into the sea. The beaches are known for their cleanliness and well-maintained state. The crystal-clear waters of the Black Sea make Elenite a popular bathing destination.

Leisure Activities: In addition to beach life, Elenite offers a variety of recreational opportunities. These include water sports such as jet skiing, parasailing, and diving. There are also entertainment options like evening shows, nightclubs, and bars for tourists who want to enjoy the nightlife.

Water Park: One of the highlights of Elenite is the "Aqua Park Atlantida." This water park features a variety of water slides, pools, and attractions for visitors of all ages. It is a popular destination for families with children.

Nature: The region around Elenite also offers opportunities to explore Bulgarian nature. Nearby nature parks and reserves are great for hiking and birdwatching.

Elenite is a popular holiday destination in Bulgaria, particularly attractive to families and vacationers seeking a relaxing beach getaway. With its sandy beaches, water park, and all-inclusive offerings, it has become a sought-after destination on the Black Sea coast.



Miscellaneous:
If you have any questions about this property or would like to arrange a viewing, please feel free to contact us at the provided contact details!

Location:
Sveti Vlas is a beautiful resort town in eastern Bulgaria, located 10 km from Nessebar and 38 km from Burgas Airport. The town is only 6 km from the largest resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, Sunny Beach, but offers a completely different atmosphere, making it an excellent choice for family vacations.

In the last 10 years, many hotels and complexes have been built in Sveti Vlas, significantly expanding the town and making it a preferred destination for relaxation and recreation.

Sveti Vlas offers a wide range of accommodations with various styles and architecture, providing all kinds of amenities: swimming pools, recreation areas, sun loungers, spa centers, fitness studios, excellent children’s entertainment, and much more. All of this attracts tourists from around the world who choose to enjoy their holidays in this calm and beautiful town.

Sveti Vlas is unique with its location at the foot of the easternmost part of the Balkan Mountains, right by the beach. This combination of sea and mountains creates a unique and healing climate, especially beneficial for people with respiratory issues. The nearby pine forest and the sea breeze come together in an extraordinary way, adding to the charm of this amazing resort. Here, spring and autumn are long and warm, while winter is short and mild.

For the convenience of holidaymakers, there are companies in all complexes and hotels that take care of the adjacent areas and their appearance. When you wake up in the morning, you might enjoy the scent of freshly mown grass intertwined with the sea breeze and the breath of the forest—a combination that is truly powerful and magical.

Sveti Vlas is a quiet and safe town suitable for children, as there are no large and heavily trafficked roads with a significant number of cars passing through. Most complexes and hotels are gated to provide comfort and security for their guests. On the main street of the town, there are many shops where you can buy everything from beach accessories to high-quality goods and home decor.

Noteworthy is the yacht harbor in Sveti Vlas, where you can enjoy a pleasant stroll in the afternoon or evening. Here you will find a variety of fine restaurants serving delicious Mediterranean cuisine, modern clubs, and shops, as well as charming yachts at the pier that will leave no one indifferent. The view from the yacht harbor in the evening is simply breathtaking—the lights of Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas across the coast.

Sveti Vlas is characterized by its wide beach, sandy shores with fine yellow sand, clean sea water, beach bars, sun umbrellas, sun loungers, and the absence of large crowds—all the essentials for an unforgettable and relaxing seaside vacation. These features make the resort a paradise that will captivate even the most discerning guests.

In close proximity to the beach, there are luxurious residential complexes with impressive architecture that operate year-round.

Near the yacht harbor, amidst well-maintained green spaces, there is a beautiful Orthodox church.

Sveti Vlas has a school and a kindergarten for those who live here year-round. The population of the town is approximately 6,000 people.

Location:
Ravda is a small coastal town in Bulgaria, located about 3 kilometers north of Nessebar and about 5 kilometers south of Sunny Beach. The town is situated on the Black Sea coast and is part of the Bulgarian Riviera. Here are some features of Ravda's location:

Geographical Location: Ravda stretches along the Black Sea coast and has a picturesque setting between Nessebar and Sunny Beach. The town belongs to the Burgas region and is about 30 kilometers northeast of Burgas.

Beaches: The coastline of Ravda offers sandy beaches with clear waters, which are particularly popular during the summer months. Tourists and locals enjoy sunbathing, swimming, and various water sports.

Tourist Center: Ravda has developed into a popular tourist destination, with many visitors appreciating the relaxed atmosphere, beaches, and proximity to other tourist spots like Nessebar.

Proximity to Nessebar: Ravda is located close to Nessebar, a historic town recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage site. This proximity allows visitors from Ravda to explore the rich history and culture of the region.

Infrastructure: The town has a good tourist infrastructure with hotels, restaurants, shops, and entertainment facilities that meet the needs of visitors.

Transport Links: Ravda is well connected to the rest of the region. The nearby city of Burgas has an international airport, and there are road connections to other coastal towns and tourist sites.

Overall, Ravda offers an attractive mix of beaches, history, and tourist amenities, making it an appealing destination for travelers seeking a relaxing holiday on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

Nessebar is a picturesque town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, located on a small peninsula connected to the mainland by a narrow strip of land. This location is particularly appealing as it is surrounded by water, offering views of both the open sea and the calmer waters of the bay.

The old town of Nessebar, situated on the peninsula, is of great historical significance and has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Here, you can find well-preserved ruins of ancient sites, charming medieval buildings, churches, and narrow cobblestone streets that allow a journey back in time.

The modern side of Nessebar stretches out on the mainland and includes hotels, resorts, and entertainment facilities along the coast. These areas often provide breathtaking views of the sea and are popular destinations for tourists seeking sunny beaches and vibrant nightlife.

Overall, Nessebar combines historical charm with modern amenities, attracting visitors from around the world who wish to experience the rich history and culture alongside the pleasures of a beach holiday.

Location:
Sveti Vlas is a coastal town in Bulgaria located on the Black Sea coast. Here is a description of its location:

Geographical Location: Sveti Vlas (sometimes also written as Sveti Vlas) is situated in Burgas Province in eastern Bulgaria, about 6 kilometers north of Sunny Beach, one of the most well-known holiday resorts on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The city of Burgas, Bulgaria's fourth-largest city, is approximately 40 kilometers southwest of Sveti Vlas.

Coast and Beaches: Sveti Vlas stretches along the Black Sea coastline and offers access to various beaches. The beaches are often characterized by clear waters and wide sandy shores, making them popular with tourists. Water activities such as swimming, snorkeling, and boat trips are common here.

Nature and Surroundings: The town lies at the foot of the Balkan Mountains and provides a picturesque backdrop of mountains and sea. Its proximity to the Black Sea gives the region a pleasant maritime climate.

Accessibility: Sveti Vlas is easily accessible and about 30-40 minutes by car from Burgas International Airport. The town is connected by roads and highways to other cities along the Black Sea coast and inland.

Tourist Attractions: Sveti Vlas is popular among tourists seeking a more relaxed alternative to busier resorts like Sunny Beach. The town offers a variety of restaurants, bars, and shops. The port of Sveti Vlas provides opportunities for boat excursions and water sports activities. Around Sveti Vlas, there are also options for hiking and exploring nature.

Sveti Vlas offers a tranquil environment and is well-suited for vacationers looking for peace and relaxation without sacrificing the natural beauty and charm of the Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

The central part of the resort is 150 meters away and offers a variety of shops, luxury restaurants, bars, and nightclubs. Nearby is a large supermarket, a medical center, and convenient bus stops. This makes the apartment suitable for summer holidays, seasonal rentals, as well as year-round use.

The Grand Kamelia complex is located in the western part of the Sunny Beach holiday resort.

Excellent location - 500 meters from the beach and 150 meters from the central pedestrian promenade. The infrastructure around the complex is very well developed; the supermarket "Mladost" is 20 meters away, and the central bus station is 100 meters away.

The area is quiet and peaceful, yet close to many entertainment options, restaurants, and nightclubs.

Sunny Beach, also known as Slanchev Bryag in Bulgaria, is a popular resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. Here is a description of its location:

Geographical Location: Sunny Beach stretches along Bulgaria's eastern coast and belongs to Burgas Province. The city of Burgas, Bulgaria's fourth-largest city, is about 35 kilometers southwest of Sunny Beach. The historic town of Nessebar, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is only about 6 kilometers north of Sunny Beach.

Beach and Coast: Sunny Beach is known for its wide, golden sandy beach along the Black Sea coast. The beach gently slopes into the sea and is ideal for sunbathing and water sports such as swimming, jet skiing, and parasailing.

Nature and Surroundings: The region around Sunny Beach features picturesque nature, including pine forests and dunes. Its proximity to the Black Sea provides a pleasant maritime climate.

Accessibility: Sunny Beach is easily accessible. Burgas Airport is the nearest international airport, approximately 30-40 minutes by car away. The town is connected to other cities on the Black Sea coast and inland via roads and highways.

Tourist Attractions: Sunny Beach is a lively holiday destination with numerous restaurants, bars, nightclubs, and shops. The area also offers water parks, recreational activities, shopping opportunities, and excursions into the surrounding region. Near Sunny Beach are historical sites such as Nessebar Old Town, which is also a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Sunny Beach is a popular destination, especially during the summer months. It offers a wide range of accommodations—from simple apartments to luxury hotels. The combination of sun, beach, and entertainment makes Sunny Beach an attractive place for travelers seeking an active and entertaining seaside vacation.

The village has a well-developed infrastructure: many shops, cafes, and restaurants, hotel facilities, post office, administration, kindergarten, school, church, sports and playgrounds, public transport, ATM, pharmacy, and much more.

The total area of the houses is 90 m². Location:
Kosharitsa is a village in Bulgaria, located near the Black Sea coast. Here is a description of the location of Kosharitsa:

Geographical Location: Kosharitsa is situated in Burgas Province in eastern Bulgaria. The village extends inland from the Black Sea coast. The city of Burgas, the fourth largest city in Bulgaria, is about 30 kilometers southwest of Kosharitsa.

Nature and Surroundings: The area around Kosharitsa is characterized by picturesque nature, including pine forests and hilly landscapes. The proximity to the Black Sea provides a pleasant maritime climate.

Accessibility: Kosharitsa is easily accessible by road. Burgas International Airport is the nearest airport, located about 30-40 minutes by car from Kosharitsa. The village is also connected to other towns along the Black Sea coast via the E87 highway.

Tourist Attractions: Kosharitsa is known for its calm and relaxing atmosphere and often serves as a retreat for travelers seeking closeness to the sea without staying in busier resort towns. The village offers views of the surrounding nature and can serve as a starting point for excursions to nearby coastal towns like Sunny Beach or Nessebar.

Location:
Nessebar is a historic town in Bulgaria located on a small peninsula by the Black Sea. Here are some features of the town:

Geographical Location
Position: Nessebar is located in eastern Bulgaria, about 30 kilometers north of Burgas. The town is connected to the mainland by a narrow isthmus, offering stunning views of the Black Sea.
Historical Background
Rich History: The town was founded by Thracians and was influenced by Greeks, Romans, Byzantines, and Bulgarians. The Old Town of Nessebar is a UNESCO World Heritage site, housing numerous well-preserved historical buildings and monuments.
Architecture and Attractions
Medieval Architecture: The Old Town is known for its narrow streets and impressive churches, such as the Church of St. Sophia and the Church of Christ Pantocrator. The city walls and towers are remnants of its strategic significance in the past.
Tourist Attractions
Popular Destination: Nessebar attracts tourists for both its historical importance and its picturesque coastal setting. The beaches around the town are ideal for relaxation, while the Old Town offers a charming atmosphere with restaurants, shops, and cafés.
Connection to Sunny Beach
Easy Access: Nessebar is connected to Sunny Beach by a narrow isthmus, making it convenient for visitors to one of the largest resorts on the Black Sea.
Panoramic Views
Breathtaking Scenery: Due to its location on the peninsula, Nessebar provides spectacular views of the Black Sea, especially at sunset.


Miscellaneous:
If you have any questions about this property or would like to schedule a viewing, please feel free to contact us using the provided contact details.

Luxurious two-room apartment with panoramic sea views in a frontline complex in Sozopol. The apartment is located on the fourth floor and has an area of 114 m². It is a spacious property suitable for both permanent residence and vacation. The apartment has a comfortable and functional layout, including a living room with dining area and kitchenette, two spacious bedrooms, a bathroom with WC, an entrance hall, and two beautiful, attractive terraces with impressive sea views. The complex offers a rich infrastructure for comfortable living and relaxation. Here, you will find many swimming pools and children's pools, a spa for relaxation and wellness, playgrounds, tennis courts, and sports fields for an active lifestyle. The complex also has an amphitheater for cultural events and entertainment. There are shops, restaurants, cafes, and even a pizzeria within the complex, making your stay even more comfortable. You can enjoy delicious pizza directly on the property or go shopping without having to travel far. This apartment is the perfect combination of space, comfort, and amenities. The panoramic sea view adds a special charm and romance to your life on the Black Sea coast. Don’t miss the opportunity to purchase this gem in Sozopol and enjoy an incredible life by the sea in a prestigious complex.

Location:
Sozopol is one of the oldest and most charming towns on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. Known for its rich history, beautiful beaches, and vibrant cultural scene, it is a popular destination for tourists and locals alike. Here are some key points about Sozopol:

Sozopol is located on a small rocky peninsula in the southern part of the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, about 35 kilometers south of the city of Burgas.
The town is accessible by road, with regular bus connections from Burgas and other nearby cities. The nearest airport is Burgas Airport, located about 45 kilometers away.
Sozopol’s old town is a cultural and historical treasure with narrow cobblestone streets, traditional wooden houses, and numerous archaeological sites. It is designated as an architectural and archaeological reserve.
There are several old churches in Sozopol, including the Church of St. George and the Church of St. Zosimus, which are notable for their architecture and historical significance.
Sozopol is a beautiful and historic town that offers a unique blend of cultural heritage, scenic beauty, and modern amenities. The well-preserved old town, vibrant cultural scene, and beautiful beaches make it a must-visit on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

The apartment is luxuriously furnished and equipped to a high standard, ready for immediate occupancy. Location:
Sveti Vlas, also known as Saint Vlas, is a picturesque coastal town in Bulgaria. It is located on the Black Sea coast and borders the popular resort of Sunny Beach (Slantschew brjag) to the south and the historic town of Nessebar to the north. The town of Sveti Vlas is situated about 35 kilometers northeast of Burgas and approximately 4 kilometers northwest of Sunny Beach.

The location of Sveti Vlas is particularly attractive as it stretches at the foot of the Balkan Mountains while offering a scenic view of the Black Sea. This makes the town a popular destination for tourists who want to enjoy both the coast and nature.

In recent years, the town has developed into a rising holiday resort, featuring modern hotels, vacation apartments, and restaurants. The marina of Sveti Vlas is another highlight, attracting many visitors who love water sports and boat trips.

The old town of Sveti Vlas has preserved its traditional charm, offering narrow streets, traditional Bulgarian houses, and some historical landmarks. There are also numerous beaches in the area, including the popular Sveti Vlas beach, known for its crystal-clear waters.

The region around Sveti Vlas also offers many opportunities for outdoor activities such as hiking in the Balkan Mountains and exploring the nearby nature parks.

Overall, Sveti Vlas is a versatile travel destination that appeals to both beachgoers and nature lovers, providing a successful blend of modern tourism and traditional Bulgarian culture.

Location:
Byala is a charming coastal town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, located approximately halfway between the cities of Varna and Burgas. The town is about 50 kilometers south of Varna and about 70 kilometers north of Burgas. Byala is known for its picturesque location, historical landmarks, and relaxed atmosphere.

The town stretches along a coastline with impressive cliffs and beautiful sandy beaches. Byala's main beach is long and wide, with clear water and a number of beach bars and cafés offering refreshments. This beach is popular with both locals and tourists, providing a laid-back environment for sunbathing, swimming, and relaxing.

In addition to its beaches, Byala also boasts a rich history and culture. The town is home to archaeological sites from the Roman era, as well as the remains of a Byzantine fortress on a nearby hill that visitors can explore. The old town of Byala is also worth a visit, with its narrow streets, traditional houses, and cozy restaurants serving local specialties.

Byala is also known for its wine production, and visitors have the opportunity to visit local wineries and sample regional wines. The surrounding landscape is characterized by vineyards and gentle hills, making it an attractive destination for hiking and cycling.

Overall, Byala offers a peaceful and relaxed atmosphere, perfect for travelers seeking an authentic and less crowded seaside resort. With its rich history, beautiful beaches, and idyllic landscape, Byala is a charming place for a relaxing holiday on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

Description of object:
We offer you a penthouse apartment with a sea view at Marina Sunrise in Sveti Vlas, Bulgaria.  
The entrance area consists of a wardrobe. The living room with an adjoining kitchen features:

One of them includes a washing machine.

A staircase leads to the rooftop terrace, where there are loungers and an additional shower. You will have a stunning view of the sea.

Fixture and fittings:
We present to you a 3-room apartment with a roof terrace and a view of the sea. The apartment consists of an entrance area, 2 bedrooms, 1 living room, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen, and 2 balconies. The apartment is sold furnished and with electrical appliances.

Location:
Sveti Vlas, also known as Sveti Vlas or Saint Vlas, is a picturesque coastal town in Bulgaria. It is located on the Black Sea coast and borders the popular holiday resort Sunny Beach (Slantschew brjag) to the south and the historic town of Nessebar to the north. The town of Sveti Vlas is approximately 35 kilometers northeast of Burgas and about 4 kilometers northwest of Sunny Beach.

The location of Sveti Vlas is particularly charming, as it stretches at the foot of the Balkan Mountains while offering a scenic view of the Black Sea. This makes the town a popular destination for tourists who want to enjoy both the coast and nature.

The town itself has developed into an emerging holiday resort in recent years, offering modern hotels, holiday apartments, and restaurants. The marina in Sveti Vlas is another highlight and attracts many visitors who love water sports and boat excursions.

The old town of Sveti Vlas has preserved its traditional charm, featuring narrow streets, traditional Bulgarian houses, and some historical attractions. In the surrounding area, there are also numerous beaches, including the popular Sveti Vlas Beach, known for its crystal-clear waters.

The region around Sveti Vlas also offers many opportunities for outdoor activities such as hiking in the Balkan Mountains and exploring nearby natural parks.

Overall, Sveti Vlas is a versatile travel destination that appeals to both beach vacationers and nature lovers, providing a successful blend of modern tourism and traditional Bulgarian culture.

Objektbeschreibung:
Wir bieten Ihnen eine 3 Zimmer Wohnung in Sveti Vlas Bulgarien. Die Wohnung verfügt über einen Eingangsbereich, einem Wohnzimmer mit integrierter Küche und Zugang zur Terrasse. Das Wohnzimmer verfügt über eine Couch, Couchtisch, Schrank, TV, Esstisch, Stühle, Klimaanlage, Lampe, Gardinen. Die integrierte Küche verfügt über, Kühlschrank mit Gefrierfach, Waschmaschine, Elektroherd mit Cerankochfeld und Schränke. Die Schlafzimmer verfügen über, Doppelbetten, Nachttische, Anbauwand, Gardinen, Zugang zur Terrasse. Das Badezimmer ist als Duschbad ausgelegt. Die Terrassen bieten Ihnen einen Fernblick.

Ausstattung/Zubehör:
Wir bieten eine Wohnung mit zwei Schlafzimmern in einer gemütlichen Wohnanlage mit Swimmingpool zum Verkauf an, 200 Meter vom Meer entfernt in Sveti Vlas.
Die Wohnung befindet sich im 2. realen Stock in einem vierstöckigen Gebäude. Die Fläche der Wohnung beträgt 73 m² und besteht aus einem Flur, einem Wohnzimmer mit Küchenzeile, zwei Schlafzimmern, einem Badezimmer mit WC und drei Terrassen.
Die Immobilie wird mit Möbeln und Geräten angeboten. Es hat ein sehr komfortables und funktionales Layout.
Die Wohnung ist extrem hell, mit französischen Fenstern im Wohnzimmer.
Der Komplex befindet sich in einer ruhigen und malerischen Gegend von Sveti Vlas. In der Nähe des Komplexes gibt es mehrere Supermärkte und Geschäfte, ein Restaurant, 50 Meter entfernt - Bushaltestelle. Der Hafen ist ca. 400 Meter entfernt.
Das Gebäude hat Act 16.

Ausstattung des Komplexes:


Schwimmbad Parkplatz
Spielplatz
Kontrollierter Zugang

Die Wohnung ist für eine große Familie geeignet und eignet sich für das ganzjährige Wohnen.

Lage Haus/Grundstück:
Sveti Vlas, auch bekannt als Sveti Vlas (bulgarisch: Свети Влас), ist eine malerische Küstenstadt in Bulgarien. Die Stadt liegt am Schwarzen Meer und erstreckt sich entlang der Ostküste des Landes. Hier sind einige wichtige Merkmale und Informationen zur Lage von Sveti Vlas:

Geografische Lage: Sveti Vlas befindet sich an der bulgarischen Riviera, südlich der Stadt Nessebar und nördlich von Sunny Beach (Slantschew Brjag). Die Stadt liegt in der Nähe des Balkangebirges und bietet somit eine beeindruckende Mischung aus Küsten- und Berglandschaften.

Küstenlage: Die Stadt erstreckt sich entlang der Küste des Schwarzen Meeres und verfügt über mehrere schöne Strände. Die Lage am Meer macht Sveti Vlas zu einem beliebten Urlaubsziel für Touristen, die die Sonne, das Meer und Wassersportaktivitäten genießen möchten.

Yachthäfen: Sveti Vlas beherbergt mehrere Yachthäfen, darunter den Dinevi Yachthafen, der zu den größten in Bulgarien zählt. Dies zieht Segler und Yachtliebhaber aus der ganzen Welt an.

Touristische Attraktionen: Die Stadt ist auch für ihre touristischen Attraktionen bekannt, darunter Restaurants, Bars, Geschäfte und ein aufregendes Nachtleben. In der Nähe von Sveti Vlas liegt das UNESCO-Weltkulturerbe Nessebar mit seiner gut erhaltenen Altstadt.

Natur und Umgebung: Die Lage von Sveti Vlas in der Nähe des Balkangebirges bietet eine wunderschöne Naturlandschaft mit Wander- und Outdoor-Aktivitäten in den Bergen. Dies macht die Stadt zu einem großartigen Ziel für Natur- und Abenteuerliebhaber.

Erreichbarkeit: Sveti Vlas ist gut an die nahegelegenen Städte Burgas und Varna sowie an den internationalen Flughafen Burgas angebunden. Touristen können die Stadt bequem über Straßen, Busse und Flugverbindungen erreichen.

Insgesamt ist Sveti Vlas eine attraktive Küstenstadt, die eine Mischung aus natürlicher Schönheit, touristischen Annehmlichkeiten und Aktivitäten bietet und somit eine beliebte Destination für Urlauber in Bulgarien ist.

Sonstiges:
Haben sie Fragen zu diesem Objekt, oder wünschen Sie eine Besichtigung? Dann nehmen Sie gerne unverbindlich Kontakt über die angegebenen Kontaktdaten auf.

Two-room apartment in the Troshevo district, very close to Dobri Chintulov Primary School. The apartment is located on the 6th floor of a total of 8 in a well-maintained building with controlled access. Location:
Troshevo is a neighborhood in the city of Varna, located on the Black Sea coast in northeastern Bulgaria. Here are some key pieces of information about Troshevo and Varna:

Troshevo, Varna


- Location: Troshevo is situated in the western part of Varna, one of Bulgaria's largest cities. It is a well-developed residential area with a mix of residential buildings, shopping centers, and various amenities.

Highlights and Surroundings of Troshevo


1. Shopping Opportunities: Troshevo hosts several shopping centers and supermarkets that meet the daily needs of residents and visitors. These include the Mall Varna and various smaller shops.

2. Residential Area: The neighborhood is known for its residential areas with modern apartment complexes as well as older buildings, providing a good mix of housing options.

3. Educational Institutions: Troshevo has several schools and kindergartens, making it an attractive area for families.

4. Public Transport Connectivity: Troshevo is well connected to Varna's public transport network, with several bus lines running through the neighborhood. This makes it easy to access other parts of the city, including the city center and coastal areas.

Highlights of Varna


1. Beaches: Varna is known for its beautiful beaches along the Black Sea coast, which attract many tourists during the summer.

2. Cultural Attractions:
   - Archaeological Museum: This museum exhibits some of the oldest gold treasures in the world, originating from the region.
   - Sea Garden: A large park along the coast, ideal for walks, picnics, and various recreational activities.
   - Roman Baths: Remnants of ancient Roman baths, providing insight into the city's history.

3. Education and Economy: Varna is an important educational and economic center in Bulgaria, with several universities and a dynamic economy.

4. Transport Connections: Varna is well connected to the rest of the country and international destinations. Varna Airport (VAR) offers domestic and international flights, and the Port of Varna is a major hub for maritime traffic.

We present to you a spacious two-room apartment with a total area of 48 sq. m in the Sunny View South complex in Sunny Beach. The apartment consists of an entrance hall, a living room with a kitchen area and seating area, a bedroom, a bathroom, and a terrace. Sold with furniture and appliances.


The Sunny View South complex was built in 2007. Closed, well-maintained area with a swimming pool, playground, and parking.


Sunny Beach is one of the largest family resorts in Bulgaria. It is located 42 km north of Burgas and 90 km from Varna. The resort is situated in a small bay, and its northern part includes the Stara Planina Mountains - all this provides a wonderful combination of sea and mountains and natural protection from cold winds and bad weather. The climate is mild Mediterranean with 1,700 hours of sunshine from May to September. The average air temperature in summer is +27 °C, and the water is +24 °C. Thanks to the gentle sea breeze, there is no oppressive heat. The resort has been awarded the International Blue Flag for the proven environmental benefits of the Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

Location:
Sunny Beach is one of the most famous and largest resorts on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The place is known for its long sandy beaches, vibrant nightlife, and a variety of recreational activities. Here are some key facts about Sunny Beach:

Location: Sunny Beach is located about 35 kilometers north of Burgas and about 5 kilometers north of Nessebar.

Highlights and Activities:


Beaches: Sunny Beach offers an 8-kilometer long sandy beach with fine golden sand and clear water. The beaches are well-maintained and provide numerous leisure opportunities such as jet skiing, windsurfing, parasailing, and beach volleyball.

Nightlife: Sunny Beach is known for its vibrant nightlife with numerous bars, clubs, and discotheques. Some of the most famous clubs attract international DJs and artists.

Water Sports and Recreational Activities: In addition to water sports, there are also mini golf, go-karting, bungee jumping, and many other activities for adventurers and families.

Action Aquapark: A large water park in Sunny Beach with numerous slides, pools, and attractions, ideal for a family outing.

Shopping and Gastronomy: Sunny Beach offers a variety of shops, boutiques, restaurants, and cafés that offer everything from souvenirs to international and Bulgarian specialties.

Events and Festivals: During the summer months, Sunny Beach hosts numerous events, concerts, and festivals that attract visitors from all over the world.

Description of object:
We offer for sale a house with a panoramic sea view over two floors with a total area of 301 m² and a garden of 700 m², located 1.5 km from Konstantin and Elena. The house is built with the highest class energy-efficient materials, featuring ceiling heights of 2.90 m, aluminum window frames, thermal break with French windows, and mechanisms (lift-slide), high-class internal magnetic doors.

There is a rough-in for a photovoltaic system on the roof, heating and cooling from top-tier air conditioning units (Mitsubishi) with intelligent control functions via phone, built-in security system with control and alarm signaling from the phone, and video surveillance cameras. The latest model of built-in appliances (Bosch).

Layout: 
- Floor 1: Living room with dining area of 60 m², hallway, WC, shoe closet, storage room, technical room, and a garage for two cars of 36 m² with automatic doors. 
- Floor 2: Master bedroom of 28 m² with an ensuite bathroom of 9 m² and a walk-in closet of 10 m², second bedroom of 16 m², third bedroom of 16 m², fourth bedroom of 13 m² divided with two bathrooms of 5 m² and 3 m², laundry room with a hallway and a staircase of 16 m² connecting all bedrooms. A large panoramic terrace of 26 m² connects three bedrooms and a private terrace of 7.5 m² with the fourth bedroom, tiled with granite. High-quality laminate flooring, oak steps on the stairs, bathrooms equipped with high-class built-in fixtures (Grohe) and built-in thermostatic showers.

The house is furnished with custom-designed furniture. Yard: landscaped 700 m², separate summer veranda of 70 m², autonomous irrigation hydrophore system, and a 20 m³ well for collecting rainwater from the roof and all siphons, automatic lawn mower, yard lighting, and high-quality granite pathways around the house, parking for two cars.

Location:
Manastirski, also known as Manastirski Rid, is an area near the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, renowned for its tranquil and picturesque surroundings. Here are some key points about Manastirski:

Location

Manastirski is located about 10 kilometers northeast of Varna, near Golden Sands, one of Bulgaria's most famous resorts.

Highlights and Activities

1. Nature and Recreation: Manastirski is situated in a wooded and hilly area, ideal for walks and hikes. The tranquility and beautiful nature make it a perfect place for relaxation.

2. Proximity to Golden Sands: Golden Sands, one of the most popular and bustling resorts on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, is just a few kilometers away. Here, you'll find beautiful sandy beaches, numerous water sports options, and a vibrant nightlife.

3. Euxinograd Botanical Garden: Close to Manastirski is the Euxinograd Palace, home to a stunning botanical garden. The palace was once the summer residence of Bulgarian kings and offers a fascinating blend of architecture and nature.

4. Aladzha Monastery: A medieval rock monastery located about 6 kilometers north of Manastirski. The monastery is known for its well-preserved frescoes and interesting history.

Manastirski is an ideal place for a peaceful and relaxing stay near the lively Bulgarian Black Sea coast. With its proximity to Varna, Golden Sands, and other attractions, it offers a perfect combination of nature, culture, and relaxation.

There are air conditioners and a fireplace. Ready for a comfortable stay.

Location:

It is a unique, ecologically clean area with incredible panoramic views. Within a 30 km radius, there are many caves, springs, Roman fortresses, and a horse base.

The village has the necessary infrastructure: shops, cafés, administration, a church, regular city buses, and school buses.

The complex impresses with high-quality construction, excellent location, and beautiful views. This property is suitable for both seasonal rental and summer vacations, as well as for permanent living.

The apartment is spacious and functional, with the following layout: entrance hall, large living room, two bedrooms, bathroom with WC, separate WC, and terrace with stunning views of the sea and the pool. Ipanema Beach in Sveti Vlas is a luxurious beach area characterized by its exclusive location and high-quality amenities. Here are some details about the location and features of Ipanema Beach in Sveti Vlas:

Location

Black Sea Coast: Ipanema Beach is located directly on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast in Sveti Vlas. The location offers stunning views of the sea and the surrounding hills of the Balkan Mountains.
Proximity to Sunny Beach: The beach is just a few kilometers north of Sunny Beach, allowing guests to easily access the bustling entertainment and shopping options of Sunny Beach while enjoying the tranquil and luxurious atmosphere of Sveti Vlas.
Features

Luxurious Amenities: Ipanema Beach is known for its high-quality facilities and exclusive service. The beach area offers comfortable sun loungers, elegant umbrellas, and private cabanas that provide guests with a touch of luxury.
Cleanliness and Safety: The beach is well-maintained and features crystal-clear water, ideal for swimming. Safety measures such as lifeguards and safe swimming zones ensure the security of guests.
Beach Bars and Restaurants: Along the beach, there are several upscale beach bars and restaurants offering a variety of culinary delights and refreshing drinks. These establishments are perfect for enjoying a relaxing day at the beach.

Exclusive Atmosphere: The beach attracts an upscale clientele and offers a calm and relaxed environment, ideal for those seeking relaxation.
Accessibility

Transport: Ipanema Beach is easily accessible by car, with parking available nearby. Regular bus connections to Sveti Vlas and nearby locations such as Sunny Beach and Nessebar make the beach easily accessible. The nearest major airport is Burgas Airport, approximately 35 kilometers south of Sveti Vlas.
Conclusion Ipanema Beach in Sveti Vlas is a top destination for vacationers seeking luxury and relaxation on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. With its exclusive amenities, upscale restaurants and bars, diverse recreational opportunities, and proximity to the attractions of Sunny Beach, Ipanema Beach offers the perfect blend of comfort, entertainment, and natural beauty.

The resort is known for its stunning location, top-notch amenities, and proximity to beautiful beaches. Here are some details about the location and features of The Cliff Beach & Spa Resort in Obzor:

Location

Obzor: The Cliff Beach & Spa Resort is located in Obzor, a small but popular resort town between the cities of Varna and Burgas. Obzor is about 60 kilometers south of Varna and about 70 kilometers north of Burgas.
Black Sea Coast: The resort is situated directly on the Black Sea coast, on a cliff that offers spectacular views of the sea. This elevated location provides impressive panoramic views and a peaceful, secluded atmosphere.
Beaches: Access to the beaches of Obzor is easy and convenient. The area is known for its long, wide sandy beaches, ideal for sunbathing and swimming.
Features

Leisure Activities: Besides beaches and the yacht marina, there are many leisure options such as water sports, boat trips, hiking, and cycling in the surrounding hills. Numerous restaurants, bars, and shops also add variety.
Accessibility

Conclusion
Saint Vlas is an attractive destination on Bulgaria’s Black Sea coast that offers a relaxed yet luxurious atmosphere. With its beautiful beaches, modern marina, health and wellness facilities, and proximity to the lively attractions of Sunny Beach, Saint Vlas is ideal for travelers seeking both relaxation and entertainment.

This spacious, newly built house is for sale in the village of Ravna Gora, ideal for year-round living. Located approximately 20 km from the town of Avren and just 6 km from the beautiful beaches of Shkorpilovtsi, the area boasts good infrastructure and excellent transport links. Last year, the road to the coastline was repaired, and a major project for the renovation of the road from the village of Benkovski to Ravna Gora has commenced. The village features a community center with a rich library, grocery stores, a guesthouse, a medical practice, a café, and a post office. The charm of the village is enhanced by preserved houses from the late 19th century and a small river flowing nearby. There is regular bus service connecting the village to the cities of Varna and the surrounding villages.

The house is finished with high-quality materials following a design project, offering spacious rooms and high ceilings of 3.20 m. It spans three floors, with both the first and second floors measuring 85 m² and the attic (with slants) covering 75 m², totaling a built-up area of 245 m². The layout includes:

Second Floor: Two large bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and WC, along with a terrace offering stunning sea views.

The house is completed according to Bulgarian State Standards (BDS) and can be finished "turnkey" according to the buyer's preferences.

The building has Act 16.

Utility tariffs for electricity and water apply.

The property is suitable for rent, summer holidays, or year-round living.

The distance to the sea is 100 meters.



Location:
Ravda is a small but growing holiday resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, located about 5 kilometers south of Nessebar and approximately 30 kilometers north of Burgas. This coastal town is particularly popular with families and couples looking for a quiet and relaxing vacation in a beautiful setting.

Location and Surroundings
Geographical Location: Ravda lies directly on the Black Sea coast and offers a range of beaches with fine sand and clear water. The town is situated between the larger and more well-known holiday destinations Nessebar and Aheloy, and is only about 7 kilometers from Sunny Beach.
Accessibility: The resort is well connected via the main road (E87) that runs along the coastline. Burgas International Airport is approximately 20-25 minutes by car, making it easy for international visitors to reach. There are also regular bus connections to Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas.
Surroundings: Ravda is surrounded by a picturesque coastal landscape with several small coves and long beaches. The area offers a blend of natural beauty and tourist amenities without the hustle and bustle of larger resorts.

Infrastructure and Amenities

Beaches: Ravda has several beaches, including the central beach and the southern beach. The beaches are known for their fine sand and calm, shallow waters, making them ideal for families with children. Some beaches are surrounded by dunes and green areas, providing a natural and relaxing atmosphere.
Accommodations: There is a variety of accommodation options in Ravda, ranging from small family hotels and guesthouses to modern holiday apartments and resorts. Many accommodations offer sea views and easy access to the beaches.
Restaurants and Cafés: The town offers a good selection of restaurants serving Bulgarian cuisine, seafood, and international dishes. The cafés and bars along the coast provide relaxed spots to unwind with a drink at the end of the day.
Leisure and Entertainment: Ravda is known for its relaxed atmosphere, but there are also plenty of recreational options. Nearby, you can find water parks, mini-golf, and water sports such as windsurfing and jet skiing. A visit to Aqua Paradise, one of Bulgaria's largest water parks, is highly recommended for families.
Cultural Attractions: The proximity to the ancient town of Nessebar, a UNESCO World Heritage site, offers visitors the chance to explore historical landmarks and well-preserved ancient architecture. Nessebar is just a short bus or car ride from Ravda.
Special Features

Quiet Atmosphere: Compared to larger resorts like Sunny Beach, Ravda provides a quieter and more relaxing environment, particularly suitable for families and travelers seeking rest.
Central Location: Strategically located between Burgas and Sunny Beach, Ravda serves as an ideal starting point for excursions in the region without the bustle of larger towns.
Family-Friendly: The place is very family-friendly, with safe beaches, playgrounds, and activities specifically designed for families with children.
Summary
Ravda is an idyllic and tranquil resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, characterized by its beautiful location, clean beaches, and family-friendly atmosphere. With its proximity to historical landmarks, natural attractions, and larger resorts, Ravda offers an ideal mix of relaxation and entertainment, making it an attractive destination for a restful holiday.

The apartment is literally just a stone's throw from the beautiful beach and is sold in excellent condition. It comes with a complete rental package, ready to move in, and a kitchen equipped with a refrigerator with freezer, oven, microwave, washing machine, etc. Laminate flooring in the bedrooms. Underfloor heating in the bathrooms.

Messambria Fort Beach is located in Elenite and has direct access to the beautiful beach. The resort complex offers numerous facilities and amenities:

2 swimming pools
Children's pool and play area
Bar and restaurant
Direct access to the beach via secure gates
24-hour security service and parking
Beautifully landscaped gardens
On-site management with annual rental contracts available

Location:
Elenite is a small, exclusive resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, located about 10 kilometers northeast of Sunny Beach and approximately 40 kilometers north of Burgas. The area is known for its tranquil setting, beautiful surroundings, and holiday facilities that primarily cater to families and couples seeking a relaxing vacation.

Geographical Location:

Location: Elenite, Bulgaria
Coordinates: Approximately 42.7117° N latitude and 27.8144° E longitude
Elevation: Elenite is situated directly on the Black Sea coast, nestled between the foothills of the Stara Planina mountain range (Balkan Mountains) and the sea. This location provides a sheltered environment with a microclimate that offers mild summers and less wind than in the surrounding areas.
Surroundings:

Sunny Beach: Elenite is about 10 kilometers northeast of Sunny Beach, the largest and most popular resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. Sunny Beach offers a variety of restaurants, bars, nightclubs, and leisure activities. Its proximity to Sunny Beach makes Elenite an attractive choice for vacationers who want to occasionally enjoy the vibrant life of Sunny Beach but prefer to stay in a quieter environment.

Sveti Vlas: Located just 4 kilometers southwest of Elenite, Sveti Vlas is known for its marina, Marina Dinevi, as well as its upscale restaurants and boutiques. Sveti Vlas has become one of the most prestigious spots along the Bulgarian coast in recent years.

Burgas: The city of Burgas, an important cultural and economic center, is located about 40 kilometers south of Elenite. Burgas International Airport (BOJ) is the nearest airport, making Elenite easily accessible for international travelers.

Nature and Landscape:

Balkan Mountains: The foothills of the Balkan Mountains reach the coast near Elenite, providing a picturesque backdrop. The mountains protect the area from stronger winds and create a green, forested environment ideal for hiking and walks. The combination of sea and mountains makes Elenite a particularly attractive destination for nature lovers.

Black Sea: Elenite lies directly on the Black Sea, offering access to clean, fine sandy beaches. The beaches are generally quiet and less crowded than those of Sunny Beach, making them ideal for families and those seeking tranquility. The clear waters are perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and other water sports.

Infrastructure and Accessibility:

Road Connections: Elenite is connected to surrounding areas by well-developed roads. The main road E87, which runs along the coast, provides a quick connection to Sunny Beach, Sveti Vlas, and Burgas. This road passes through picturesque coastal sections, offering beautiful views of the sea and mountains.

Public Transport: There are regular bus connections between Elenite and surrounding resorts, especially to Sunny Beach and Sveti Vlas. Taxis and rental cars are also popular transportation options for exploring the region.

Facilities: Elenite is primarily a holiday resort, offering a range of hotels, resorts, and holiday apartments, often with all-inclusive packages. There are also some restaurants, bars, and shops within the resorts that provide guests with all necessary amenities.

Conclusion: Elenite is an ideal location for vacationers seeking a quieter, upscale environment while still appreciating proximity to the livelier spots along the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. With its location between the Balkan Mountains and the Black Sea, Elenite offers a unique combination of nature, tranquility, and beautiful beaches. The closeness to Sunny Beach and Sveti Vlas allows visitors to quickly dive into nightlife and entertainment options while enjoying the peaceful atmosphere of Elenite.

Location:
Sunny Beach is the largest and most famous resort on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. It is located about 35 kilometers north of Burgas and 95 kilometers south of Varna. The area is particularly popular with tourists from all over Europe and offers a mix of beaches, entertainment, culture, and nature.

Geographic Location:

Location: Sunny Beach, Bulgaria
Coordinates: Approximately 42.6943° N latitude and 27.7105° E longitude
Region: Black Sea coast, Burgas Province
Distance: About 35 km north of Burgas and 5 km north of Nessebar.
Beaches and Nature:

Beach: Sunny Beach stretches along an approximately 8-kilometer sandy beach known for its fine golden sand. The beach is wide and offers plenty of space for sun loungers, water sports, and beach bars. The water is clean and calm, making it ideal for families with children. The beach is divided into different zones, offering various activities and facilities, from quiet areas for relaxation to lively sections with music and sports.

Nature: In addition to the beach, the area around Sunny Beach features several nature reserves, including the Atanasovsko Lake area north of Burgas, known for its birdwatching opportunities. The foothills of the Balkan Mountains are also nearby, offering hiking and exploration opportunities in nature.

Entertainment and Activities:

Nightlife: Sunny Beach is known for its vibrant nightlife and attracts mainly young vacationers. The promenade is lined with bars, clubs, and discos that stay open until the early morning hours. Famous clubs like "Cacao Beach" attract DJs and partygoers from around the world.

Leisure: In addition to nightlife, Sunny Beach offers a variety of recreational activities, including water sports such as jet skiing, parasailing, windsurfing, and banana boating. There are also several water parks nearby that provide fun for the whole family. Mini-golf, go-karting, and beach volleyball are also popular activities.

Shopping and Dining: The main street of Sunny Beach and the promenade are filled with shops offering souvenirs, clothing, and local products. Restaurants and cafés offer a wide range of international dishes as well as Bulgarian specialties. Many restaurants have terraces overlooking the sea.

Culture and Attractions:

Nessebar: Sunny Beach is located in close proximity to the historic town of Nessebar, which is only about 5 kilometers away. Nessebar is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and features a wealth of ancient ruins, medieval churches, and traditional architecture. A visit to Nessebar is a cultural highlight and a wonderful addition to a beach holiday.

Excursions: From Sunny Beach, various excursions can be taken, for example, to Burgas, where there are cultural attractions, parks, and shopping centers, or to the wineries in the region that offer tastings.

Infrastructure and Accessibility:

Accessibility: Sunny Beach is easily accessible via Burgas International Airport, which is about a 25-minute drive away. There are also regular bus connections to other cities along the coast as well as to major inland cities like Sofia.

Description of object:
We offer you a single-family house with a total area of 250 sqm and a plot size of 2700 sqm in the small town of Sredets, Burgas region.


On the ground floor, there is an entrance area, living room, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. The upper floor has 3 additional bedrooms with double or single beds arranged as double beds, as well as another bathroom with a shower. The house is fully furnished and equipped with appliances. The terrace offers a view of the garden.


On the property, there is also an outbuilding that can be used as a party room, for example.

Fixture and fittings:
We offer you a single-family house with a plot and outbuilding in Sredets, Burgas region. The house consists of 2 floors and has a total area of 250 sqm.


On the ground floor, there is a living room, kitchen with dining area, bathroom with shower, bedroom with a double bed, and access to the terrace overlooking the garden. On the first floor, there are 3 additional bedrooms and a bathroom with a shower.

Location:
Sredets is a small town in the Burgas region of southeastern Bulgaria, located about 30 km southwest of Burgas. The town is situated in a rural, quiet area and offers a combination of beautiful nature, traditional Bulgarian village life, and cultural attractions. The region around Sredets is rich in forests, gentle hills, and agricultural land, making it ideal for nature lovers and anyone looking to escape the hustle and bustle of coastal towns.

Features and Attractions

Sredets is surrounded by landscapes that appeal to nature enthusiasts, hikers, and cyclists. The area also offers cultural and historical highlights:


    

Mandra Lake: Near Sredets lies Mandra Lake, the largest lake in Bulgaria and a popular destination for birdwatchers and anglers.

    

Strandja Mountain: The nearby Strandja Mountain provides hiking and exploration opportunities in unspoiled nature, hosting a variety of rare plant and animal species.

    

Historical Sites: In and around Sredets, there are archaeological sites indicating the ancient Thracian and Roman past of the region, as well as traditional Bulgarian architecture and old churches.

    

Ethnographic Museum: Sredets features a small ethnographic museum that provides insights into local history and culture, showcasing artifacts of rural life in the region.

Surroundings and Connectivity

Sredets is close to major transportation links and is well connected to Burgas and the coastal resorts:


    

Proximity to Burgas: Only about 30 minutes by car to Burgas, which, with its beaches, shopping, entertainment options, and international airport, serves as a central hub for the region.

    

Coastal Towns within Reach: Sunny Beach, Nessebar, and Sozopol are also relatively easy to reach and offer a wealth of leisure and cultural activities.

    

Rural Environment: The location of Sredets away from tourist centers makes the town an authentic destination for those wishing to enjoy rural Bulgaria and its nature.

Benefits of the Location


    

Nature and Tranquility: Surrounded by beautiful landscapes and a quiet environment, perfect for relaxation.

    

Cultural and Historical Insights: Traditional architecture, museums, and archaeological finds.

    

Close to Burgas: Well-connected, offering an attractive combination of rural living and proximity to urban amenities.

    

Diverse Experience Opportunities: Whether nature exploration, hiking in the Strandja Mountains, or trips to the coast, the location provides a wide range of activities.

Sredets is ideal for travelers looking to experience authentic Bulgaria and its nature while appreciating the proximity to the coast and the conveniences of larger towns.

We offer you a 2-room apartment in the Atlantis Complex in Sarafovo, Burgas Region, Bulgaria. The apartment has a living area of 87 sqm and is located on the 4th floor of a 5-story building.
The apartment features an entrance hall, a living room with a kitchenette, a bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with a shower, and a balcony with a distant view.

Fixture and fittings:
We present for sale a one-bedroom apartment in the comfortable Atlantis Complex. The complex is located in a quiet and peaceful area in Sarafovo, near the beach.

The apartment is located on the fourth floor, with a spacious terrace offering a beautiful view of the city. The total area of the apartment is 87 sqm and consists of a living room with a kitchenette, a separate hallway, a bedroom, and a bathroom. The apartment is fully furnished and equipped with modern appliances.

The complex consists of several buildings, and on the territory, you can enjoy a luxurious swimming pool for both children and adults, as well as many services for holidaymakers.

Location:
Sarafovo is a quiet coastal district of Burgas, located about 10 kilometers north of the city center. It lies along the Bulgarian Black Sea coast and is in close proximity to Burgas International Airport. Sarafovo is known for its relaxed atmosphere and beautiful seaside location, making it popular with both locals and tourists.

Here are some features of Sarafovo's location:

Geographical Location: Sarafovo is situated to the north of Burgas and offers a panoramic view of the Burgas Bay, as well as nearby resorts such as Pomorie and Nessebar. Thanks to its location in a shallow bay, Sarafovo enjoys a mild climate and is often a bit warmer than the center of Burgas.

Beaches: Sarafovo has wide, fine sandy beaches that are less crowded compared to the larger beaches in major tourist areas. The beach is clean and gently sloping, making it ideal for families and those seeking tranquility. There are also a few beach bars and cafés offering a relaxed atmosphere.

Proximity to the Airport: Burgas International Airport is located right next to Sarafovo, ensuring excellent accessibility. However, flight noise is minimized through specific measures and the positioning of the runways, allowing Sarafovo to maintain its peaceful atmosphere.

Proximity to Burgas and Other Attractions: Sarafovo is just a short drive from the center of Burgas, where visitors can enjoy numerous shopping options, restaurants, cultural venues, and the famous "Sea Garden" of Burgas. The historical towns of Pomorie and Nessebar are also reachable within about 20 to 30 minutes by car or public transport.

Growing Residential Area: Sarafovo is increasingly popular as a residential area and holiday destination. In recent years, many modern apartment complexes and villas have been built, and infrastructure has been improved. There are shops, supermarkets, and restaurants that are open year-round.

Sarafovo is ideal for travelers seeking a quiet and comfortable beach location while still being well-connected to Burgas and nearby attractions. It offers a peaceful alternative to the busier tourist spots and is also well-suited for families and long stays.

Location:
Nessebar (also known as Nesebar or Несебър) is a historic coastal town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast in the Burgas Province. The town is located about 36 km northeast of Burgas and is connected to the mainland by a narrow land bridge approximately 350 m long. The old town is situated on a small rocky peninsula and has been a UNESCO World Heritage Site since 1983.

Nessebar is known for its well-preserved medieval churches, including the Church of St. Stephen and the Church of St. John Aliturgetos. The town offers a unique combination of history, architecture, and coastal landscape, making it a popular destination for tourists seeking both cultural attractions and beach vacations.

In close proximity lies the popular resort of Sunny Beach (Slanchev Bryag), known for its long sandy beaches and vibrant atmosphere.

There is also a bathroom in the basement.

We offer you a single-family house in the Sveti Georgi Complex in Kosharitsa, Bulgaria. The ground floor features a large, bright, spacious living room with an integrated luxury kitchen equipped with an oven, ceramic cooktop, hood, microwave, sink, and high-quality cabinets. The living room is furnished with a comfortable couch, coffee table, wall unit, TV, air conditioning, dining table, chairs, decor, and curtains. You have access to the terrace. A staircase leads you to the 1st floor, which has 2 bedrooms with double beds, wardrobes, nightstands, bedside lamps, air conditioners, and access to the balcony. The bathroom is designed as a shower room. In the basement, there is a laundry room with a washing machine, a room with a wardrobe, and a heating room.



Location:
The Sveti Georgi Complex is located in the charming village of Kosharitsa, at the foot of the Balkan Mountains and just a few kilometers from the lively resort of Sunny Beach (Slanchev Bryag). This location combines the tranquility and nature of the rural surroundings with proximity to beaches and the vibrant life of the Black Sea coast.


Distances to key places:



    

Sunny Beach: About 5 km; reachable in a few minutes by car or public transport. Here you will find sandy beaches, restaurants, bars, shops, and an active nightlife.

    

Nessebar: Approximately 12 km away; the historic old town offers cultural sights, charming streets, and culinary highlights.

    

Burgas: The nearest major city is about 40 km away and offers a wide range of shopping centers, cultural institutions, and an international airport.

    

Burgas Airport: Around 35 km; reachable in about 40 minutes by car.


Infrastructure and surroundings:



    

Kosharitsa Village: The village itself offers a quiet, authentic atmosphere with small shops, cafes, and traditional restaurants.

Hiking and cycling in the nearby forests and mountains.

    

Excursions to the beaches of Sunny Beach or to the historic town of Nessebar.

    

Nature lovers will appreciate the green surroundings and clear air.


Transport connections: Regular bus and shuttle services to Sunny Beach and Nessebar make mobility easy.


Location features:



    

Peace and nature: The Sveti Georgi Complex is situated in a quiet area surrounded by green nature and away from the hustle and bustle of tourist hotspots.

    

Panoramic views: Many apartments and houses offer stunning views of the mountains and the Black Sea.

    

Comfortable climate: The combination of proximity to the sea and mountains ensures a mild and pleasant climate.

Cholakova Cheshma in Kosharitsa offers an ideal combination of peaceful living in nature and proximity to popular tourist centers. This location is perfect for those seeking relaxation in nature while still enjoying the benefits of modern infrastructure and entertainment options.

The village has excellent infrastructure — a grocery store, a café and a restaurant, a kindergarten and a school, a church, a library, and bus services. This makes the property suitable for year-round living.

The house has an area of 131 square meters, spread over two floors with the following layout:

Second floor - three bedrooms, bathroom with WC, terrace overlooking the yard.

The property also features an attic space that can be used for storage.
