The exclusive villa complex Salt, Sun & Sand is located in a dreamlike setting directly on the first coastline, just a few steps away from the fine, unspoiled sandy beach - in close proximity to the village of Aheloy on the southern Bulgarian Black Sea coast.

**Quiet coastal location with perfect connectivity**  
The complex is situated in a tranquil, natural environment away from mass tourism, yet offers excellent connectivity:

- Only about 3 km to the center of Aheloy with restaurants, cafés, shopping options, and medical services  
- Approximately 10 minutes drive to the popular resort town of Ravda  
- Just 15 minutes to the old town of Nessebar (UNESCO World Heritage Site)  
- About 20 minutes to Sunny Beach - Bulgaria's largest resort  
- 20 km to Burgas Airport, which provides year-round international flight connections  

**Natural beauty and relaxation**  
The surrounding area is characterized by untouched nature, expansive coastal landscapes, salt lakes, and gentle hills. Ideal for those seeking relaxation, walkers, cyclists, or people who appreciate proximity to the sea and nature.

**Location highlights at a glance:**  
- First coastline with direct sea views  
- Quiet, private environment - no large hotels or mass developments nearby  
- Short distances to beaches, restaurants, supermarkets, and attractions  
- Quick access to the main road Burgas-Varna  
- Year-round accessibility - ideal for permanent residence or luxurious second home  

**Conclusion:**  
The location of the Salt, Sun & Sand project combines exclusivity, natural tranquility, and urban comfort - a rare find on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. Perfect for anyone who wishes to have the sea right at their doorstep without sacrificing infrastructure and quality of life.

Location:
Vetren is a district of the city of Burgas in the eponymous province in southeastern Bulgaria. It is located about 14.5 km northwest of the city center of Burgas and is easily accessible via the road to Sofia. Since the construction of the Thracian Highway, the main traffic has shifted to this route.

Vetren is situated in the Burgas Plain near the shore of Lake Atanasov. The climate is characterized by hot summers with average temperatures in July of around 24°C and mild winters with average temperatures in January of about 1°C.

Near Vetren are the mineral baths of Burgas, known since ancient times as Aquae Calidae. These thermal springs were already used by Roman emperors and are today a popular destination for those seeking relaxation.

Vetren offers good infrastructure with a kindergarten, primary school, hospital, church, and shops. There is regular public transport connection to Burgas.

Description of object:
We are offering for sale a two-story house with panoramic sea views in "Venid Eco Village," Sveti Vlas City, Nessebar Municipality. Built using eco-friendly construction methods from 2022-2023.

Total area: 199 sqm

Layout:

1st Floor: Living room with kitchen area, storage/service room, bedroom, bathroom with toilet, veranda  
2nd Floor: three bedrooms, three bathrooms with toilets, veranda

The architectural design of the house is inspired by Renaissance architecture. Characteristic materials and stylistic elements such as bay windows and overhanging roof eaves are present.

The ground floor is clad in natural stone, while the upper floor features white mineral plaster and wood paneling. The corners, window frames, and wall finishes are decorated with wooden elements and ornamental details. The roof is a gable roof with a wooden structure and decorative elements.

All materials used are environmentally friendly, eco-certified, and of high quality. The overall appearance of the development blends harmoniously into the surrounding wooded area called "Kasada" in the countryside of Sveti Vlas. Thanks to its strong south orientation, it offers a unique panoramic view of the sea and the Old Town of Nessebar.

"Venid Eco Village" features two tennis courts, an outdoor swimming pool for adults and children, an aparthotel, a chapel, parking spaces, and a comprehensive internal infrastructure in harmony with nature that provides both grounding and elevation.

Fixture and fittings:

The ground floor is clad in natural stone, while the upper floor features white mineral plaster and wooden paneling. Corners, window frames, and wall finishes are designed with wooden elements and decorative details. The roof is a gable roof with a wooden structure and decorative features.

All materials used are environmentally friendly, eco-certified, and of high quality. The overall appearance of the complex blends harmoniously into the surrounding wooded area "Kasada" in the countryside of Sveti Vlas. Thanks to its strong south orientation, it offers a unique panoramic view of the sea and the old town of Nessebar.

"Venid Eco Village" features two tennis courts, an outdoor swimming pool for adults and children, an aparthotel, a chapel, parking spaces, and comprehensive internal infrastructure in harmony with nature that provides both grounding and elevation.

The terrain has a pronounced southern orientation and steep slope, which allows for panoramic views of both the sea and the forest from almost all houses.

Medovo is an idyllic village in the municipality of Pomorie, Burgas District, located about 12-14 km from the Black Sea (Sunny Beach, Ravda, Nessebar) and 25-27 km from Burgas Airport.

Thanks to mineral-rich springs, mineral water flows directly into households—an added benefit for an ecological and healthy lifestyle.

In the village, there are restaurants, cafes, small shops, medical services, and regular bus connections to Burgas, Sunny Beach, and Pomorie.

Black Sea / Sunny Beach: approximately 12-14 km, conveniently reachable by car in 10-15 minutes.

For sale is a spacious 3-room apartment in a charming, small residential building with only 12 units, located in a quiet area between the Chateau Aheloy 1 and 2 complexes. The building offers a pleasant living atmosphere, a small communal pool, and low operating costs.

The apartment is located on the 3rd Bulgarian floor (corresponding to the 2nd upper floor) of a four-story building without an elevator. It has a total living area of 101 m² and is divided as follows:

- Generous living room with open kitchen
- Two comfortable bedrooms
- Modern bathroom with shower
- Three separate balconies, each offering different orientations and views

The apartment is ideal for both vacation property and permanent residence. The combination of a quiet location, good infrastructure, and proximity to the sea makes this property particularly attractive.

Additional details:

- Building acceptance (Act 16) available
- Annual maintenance fee: only EUR350
- Small communal pool for free use
- Quiet residential area near the beach

An excellent value for money in an emerging coastal region with good connections to Burgas, Pomorie, and Nessebar.

Location:
Geographical Location  
Aheloy is a small coastal town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast in Burgas Province, located between Burgas to the south and the tourist centers of Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Sveti Vlas to the north.  

The town is situated directly on European Route E 87 (Burgas-Varna), about 18-19 km from Burgas Airport.  

Distances: approximately 34 km to Burgas, 7 km to Sunny Beach and Nessebar, 3 km to Ravda, 10 km to Pomorie.  

Bus Connections: Regular buses, minibuses, and taxi routes connect Aheloy with Burgas, Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Varna.  

Ideally located: close to the airport and popular holiday regions, significantly ahead of the holiday traffic jams on the way to Sunny Beach.  

Long sandy beach (approximately 56,000 m² area), starting from south of the campsite and extending to Pomorie; partly narrow (about 20 m wide), ideal for a quiet vacation.  

Small marina/pier at the river mouth and in the resort village of Marina Cape.  

Historically significant: Battle of Aheloy (917 AD), monument to Tsar Simeon I in the central city park.  

Authentic fish and beach restaurants, café-bars, and hospitality shape the culture of enjoyment.

Sveti Vlas is a modern yet charmingly traditional seaside resort on the southern Black Sea coast of Bulgaria. The town belongs to the municipality of Nessebar and is beautifully situated between the Black Sea and the foothills of the Balkan Mountains. This unique location creates a healthy microclimate that is particularly beneficial for respiratory illnesses—an advantage appreciated not only by vacationers but also by year-round residents.

Just a few kilometers north of the well-known holiday center Sunny Beach (about 3 km) and approximately 35 km from Burgas Airport, Sveti Vlas offers an excellent combination of tranquility, high quality of life, and tourist infrastructure.

🌟 Highlights of Sveti Vlas
Proximity to the beach & bathing quality: Fine sandy beaches with gently sloping shores, ideal for families

Dinevi Marina: Exclusive marina with upscale boutiques, restaurants, and beach clubs

Nature & tranquility: Green surroundings, clean air, and a relaxed atmosphere—perfect for relaxation

Good accessibility: Bus connections to Sunny Beach, Nessebar, and Burgas

Year-round infrastructure: Supermarkets, pharmacies, cafes, schools, and doctors in town

🏖️ Why Sveti Vlas?
In recent years, Sveti Vlas has developed into a preferred residential and investment location—for both vacationers and expatriates. The calm and safe environment, combined with well-maintained architecture and high-quality residential complexes, makes this place particularly attractive for investors, those seeking peace, and families alike.

Conclusion: Sveti Vlas offers the best of both worlds—the proximity to the tourist infrastructure of Sunny Beach and Nessebar as well as a quiet, elegant living environment right by the sea. An ideal location for property buyers who value sea views, comfort, and sustainability.

property_description:
Description of object:
The residential complex "VENID ECO VILLAGE" complements the architectural overall concept of the holiday resort Sweti Vlas at the foot of the Balkan Mountains.

The property is located in the forest area "Kasada" within the municipality of Nessebar, in the region of Sweti Vlas. The steep slope from north to south offers a magnificent panoramic view of the sea from every angle. The location inspires the creation of a picturesque architectural ensemble with diverse views of forests and sea, which can be enjoyed from every house in the complex.

In close proximity to the complex are all the amenities and attractions of "Dinevi Resorts" - beaches, a marina, shops, restaurants, cafés, beauty salons and wellness centers, an amphitheater, and much more. The complex consists of:

109 single-family and multi-family houses (duplexes) with living areas ranging from 150 to 300 square meters. 
The KANELA complex offers 69 different apartments.
An aparthotel and a chapel that do not obstruct the sea view from other houses.
Two tennis courts and a swimming pool.

All materials used are environmentally friendly and have the highest class certification. The appearance of the complex harmonizes perfectly with the surrounding nature. Together with its proximity to the sea, mountains, and prestigious location, this justifies investing in purchasing a house in this complex. The ground floor of the houses is clad in stone. The upper floor features mineral plaster and wood cladding. There is typical wooden framing at corners, walls, and windows with wooden beams as well as so-called "Santrachi” - horizontal wooden beams for aligning the masonry.

All materials used are environmentally friendly and have the highest class certification. The appearance of the complex harmonizes perfectly with the surrounding nature.

Fixture and fittings:
The holiday resort of Sveti Vlas is located 5 km from the famous Sunny Beach at the foot of the Balkan Mountains. Its beaches stretch for up to one and a half kilometers in the form of small, cozy bays. Sveti Vlas is known for its healing climate, which arises from its favorable position at the intersection of mountain and sea climate zones. The generally recognized natural sea aerosols in the air have an impact on the respiratory system. From the coast of Sveti Vlas, one can see the old Nessebar on the opposite shore of a large bay.

Description of object:
Discover the perfect opportunity to acquire a modern home in Sveti Vlas. This charming one-bedroom ground-floor apartment in the popular Villa Florenz offers stunning views of the pool and the mountains. With an area of 52 m² and a price of only EUR115,000, this is an excellent investment in one of Bulgaria's most beautiful regions.

Fixture and fittings:
The flooring is fitted with luxurious tiles. The apartment is equipped with a washing machine, a refrigerator, and an oven. All appliances are unused and brand new. The apartment is air-conditioned and ready to be furnished to your liking.

Location:
The Villa Florenz is an exclusively designed residential complex that fits perfectly into the picturesque landscape of Sveti Vlas. Surrounded by lush nature and breathtaking views of the Black Sea and majestic mountains, the residential area offers a peaceful yet central location. The complex features a well-maintained garden, a large swimming pool area, and excellent leisure facilities.

Sveti Vlas itself is a scenic coastal village known for its clean air and Mediterranean climate. Just a few minutes from the lively Sunny Beach, the area provides a perfect blend of tranquility and proximity to all the amenities that seaside living has to offer. Numerous restaurants, cafes, and shops are nearby, making life here extremely comfortable and enjoyable.

Description of object:

The Garden of Eden complex is one of the finest and most popular holiday resorts in the country. The architecture blends classic Bulgarian elements with modern accents. Thanks to its terraced hillside location, the buildings harmoniously integrate into nature and offer panoramic views of the Black Sea or well-maintained gardens in many areas.

The Mediterranean design features water features, palm trees, manicured gardens, and spacious pool areas that give the complex a unique charm - a place of peace and relaxation right by the sea.

- Entrance area with wardrobe space

- Separate kitchen with built-in appliances
- Bedroom with double bed and storage space
- Bathroom with bathtub, sink, and toilet
- Balcony overlooking the pool area - perfect for relaxing outdoors

- Direct access to the beach (first line to the sea)
- Approximately 500 m to Dinevi Marina - exclusive yacht harbor with restaurants, boutiques & nightlife
- Supermarkets, pharmacies, and cafés within walking distance
- Bus stop with connections to Sunny Beach and Nessebar right at the complex
- About 3 km to Sunny Beach, approximately 35 km to Burgas Airport

💡 Conclusion  
This stylish apartment in Garden of Eden offers you an exceptional living and vacation experience in one of the most beautiful locations on the Bulgarian coast. Whether for personal use, as a holiday home, or for tourist rental - here you invest in quality, location, and lifestyle.

The Sole Mare Complex is a modern residential development in Aheloy, a small coastal town on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The development typically offers a mix of apartments, studios, and other facilities that appeal to both locals and foreign investors, especially those looking for second homes or vacation properties.

Aheloy is a small, picturesque town on the southern Bulgarian Black Sea coast, close to larger tourist destinations. Although it is not as well-known as Sunny Beach or Nessebar, it is increasingly gaining attention due to its quieter atmosphere combined with proximity to larger holiday resorts. The town is near nature reserves and offers beautiful views of the Black Sea. The beaches are calmer compared to the bustling areas of other major resort towns. While Aheloy is quieter, it provides basic amenities such as local shops, restaurants, and some recreational options, making it an enjoyable place for both short-term stays and long-term living.

🌊 2-Room Apartment with Sea View in the Exclusive Complex Garden of Eden, Sveti Vlas

We are pleased to offer you this attractive 2-room apartment with a sea view in the high-quality complex Garden of Eden in Sveti Vlas on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The apartment is located on the 5th floor, easily accessible by elevator, and offers approximately 72 m² of living space with a stylish and comfortable living environment - ideal for personal use or as an exclusive holiday property.

- Integrated yet visually separated kitchen with built-in appliances and storage space
- Bedroom with double bed, wardrobe, and access to the balcony
- Bathroom with bathtub, sink, and toilet
- Balcony with sea view - perfect for relaxing and enjoying

The apartment is well-maintained and ready for occupancy - a perfect combination of functionality and aesthetics.

🌴 Garden of Eden - Living Like on Holiday
The Garden of Eden is one of the most prestigious residential and holiday complexes on the Black Sea coast. The architecture combines traditional Bulgarian design elements with modern accents. The terraced arrangement of the buildings on a slope allows many units to have direct sea or garden views.

The complex offers a variety of amenities:

- 7 outdoor pools & 1 heated indoor pool
- Spa and wellness area with sauna, steam bath & gym
- Restaurants, bars, supermarket, hairdresser & beauty salon
- Private beach sections with sunbeds & umbrellas
- 24/7 security service, reception, underground parking

📍 Dream Location in Sveti Vlas
The complex is located directly on the beach at the southern edge of Sveti Vlas - one of Bulgaria's most popular holiday resorts. In close proximity is the exclusive Dinevi Marina with its yacht harbor, restaurants, and nightlife.

🌟 Highlights of Sveti Vlas
- Proximity to the beach & bathing quality: Fine sandy beaches that gently slope - ideal for families
- Dinevi Marina: Yacht harbor featuring upscale boutiques, restaurants, and beach clubs
- Nature & tranquility: Clean air, green hills, and a relaxed atmosphere
- Good accessibility: Bus connections to Sunny Beach, Nessebar, and Burgas 
- Year-round infrastructure: Supermarkets, pharmacies, cafés, schools & doctors available locally

💼 Conclusion
This 2-room apartment with sea view in Garden of Eden offers you a stylish home by the sea with access to top-notch infrastructure and breathtaking nature. Whether as a personal retreat, lucrative holiday property, or long-term investment - you will be living in one of Bulgaria's best locations.

📞 Please feel free to contact us for more information or to arrange a viewing appointment.

We present to you a stylish and comfortable 2-room apartment with sea view in the renowned 5-star complex Royal Beach Barcelo - one of the most luxurious apartment hotels on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast. The apartment is located on the 8th floor of a modern building with an elevator and offers approximately 72 m² of high-quality living space with top amenities - ideal for personal use and investors.

The apartment features a thoughtful layout and light-filled living areas:

- Living room with cozy seating area and access to the balcony
- Open kitchenette with built-in appliances and storage space
- Separate bedroom with double bed and wardrobe
- Bathroom with shower, sink, and toilet
- Balcony with impressive sea view - perfect for relaxation

The apartment is tastefully furnished and ready for immediate occupancy - ideal for both personal use and tourist rental.

🏨 Royal Beach Barcelo - Luxury & Comfort at the Highest Level  
Royal Beach Barcelo is an elegant 5-star complex in the heart of Sunny Beach, just a few steps from the beach (2nd line from the sea). The approximately 9,000 m² green area with spacious infrastructure makes this complex unique in size, style, and amenities.

Highlights of the facility:
- 3 outdoor pools & 1 heated indoor pool
- Luxurious spa center with a variety of treatments
- Gym, sauna, massage rooms
- 3 restaurants, bar, café, night bar & pool bar
- Children's playground, kids' room & animation program

Whether as a second home, vacation property, or investment object - Royal Beach Barcelo offers owners and guests a maximum level of comfort, security, and quality of life.

- About 30 km to Burgas Airport

This stylish 2-room apartment with sea view in Royal Beach Barcelo impresses with its prime location, high-quality furnishings, and access to one of the best resort offerings on the Black Sea coast. Whether for personal use or as a lucrative investment - here you acquire a property with true 5-star comfort.

🌊 3-Room Apartment in the Rutland Bay Complex, Ravda - Comfort & Sea View on the Bulgarian Coast  
We present to you an attractive 3-room apartment in the charming Rutland Bay complex in the popular seaside resort of Ravda, Burgas Region - just a few steps from the Black Sea. This property is ideal for personal use, families, or investors who value tranquility, comfort, and a well-maintained property close to the beach.

🏡 Layout & Features  
The apartment is located in a well-kept residential complex and offers approximately [please insert sqm information] m² of functional and well-thought-out layout:

- Entrance area with space for wardrobe or storage
- Living room with integrated kitchen - open plan design, with seating area, dining space, and access to the balcony
- 2 separate bedrooms - bright and friendly, ideal for families or guests
- 2 bathrooms - with shower or bathtub, toilet, and sink
- 2 balconies - with beautiful views of greenery or the sea

The apartment is furnished and equipped with everything you need for immediate occupancy or tourist rental.

🏢 The Rutland Bay Complex - A Quiet Holiday Oasis by the Sea  
The Rutland Bay Aparthotel combines modern architecture with a homely, natural atmosphere. The terraced complex harmoniously integrates into its surroundings and offers numerous amenities:

🌴 Large outdoor pool with children's area  
🌸 Well-maintained gardens and walking paths  
🍽️ Restaurant, BBQ area, massage service  
🎠 Children's playground for little guests  
🅿️ Parking on-site  
🔒 24-hour security service & reception  
📶 Wi-Fi, elevator, video surveillance  
🏖️ Beach with shallow access - just a few minutes' walk away  

📍 Prime Location in Ravda - Near Nessebar & Sunny Beach  
Just a few minutes' walk to the fine sandy beach  

Good infrastructure: supermarkets, restaurants, cafés, pharmacies  

Bus stop connecting to Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas  

Approximately 3 km to Nessebar, about 6 km to Sunny Beach, around 25 km to Burgas Airport  

💼 Conclusion  
This well-maintained 3-room apartment in the Rutland Bay complex is an excellent opportunity for anyone looking for a quiet holiday property near the sea or an attractive investment property in Bulgaria. The combination of location, features, and value for money makes this offer particularly appealing.

📞 Feel free to contact us for more information or to schedule an on-site viewing!

Fixture and fittings:
🌊 Description of Amenities - 3-Room Apartment in the Rutland Bay Complex, Ravda  
This stylishly furnished 3-room apartment is located in close proximity to the sea, offering a comfortable living environment in a quiet and well-maintained setting. Ideal as a second home or for rental!

🛋️ Overview of Layout & Amenities

This apartment not only offers plenty of space for the whole family but also features a thoughtful layout designed for comfort and functionality.

Do you require an English, Russian, Polish, or Italian translation of this amenities description? I would be happy to assist you!

Location:
Rutland Bay is a harmony of nature and solitude, where one can recover from the hustle and bustle of the city, enjoy the Bulgarian sun, and experience the measured rhythm of life by the sea. Ravda is known for its wide beaches with soft, golden sand and a gentle entry into the sea, making it particularly popular with families with children. There are no tourist crowds like in the large holiday resorts, which allows for a genuine atmosphere of coziness and Bulgarian hospitality.

In Ravda, traditional ways of life and modern conveniences are wonderfully combined. The narrow streets, old houses, and the scent of freshly baked bread create a feeling that time moves more slowly here. Nearby are new residential complexes, small hotels, cafés offering seafood dishes, and shops where you can buy local wines and fresh fruit.

For lovers of active recreation, the resort offers a variety of water activities, from windsurfing to boat trips. And thanks to its proximity to Nessebar and Sunny Beach, it's easy to take excursions and diversify your leisure time with cultural experiences.

Ravda is not just a place on the map. It is the atmosphere of a cozy morning by the sea, the taste of real Bulgarian yogurt, the sound of crashing waves, and the warm sun.

It is 22 km from Burgas Airport.

It is 107 km from Varna Airport.

property_description:
Description of object:
Elegance inscribed in the sea horizon  
In the heart of the Akladi area in Chernomorets, just three minutes from the crystal-clear waters of the exotic Blue Flag beach "Simple Beach" and Eco Camping Chernomorets, a world of tranquility, aesthetics, and exceptional quality of life unfolds - a boutique complex of single-family homes called "Sunny Island Residence." Here are houses 11 and 12 - exquisitely designed twin houses that offer not just a home but a unique experience.

With a total area of 249 m², three spacious bedrooms, three elegant bathrooms, and a bright living room with a veranda, these properties combine contemporary comfort with a sense of space and freedom. Each window provides an inspiring view of the sea and St. Ivan Island, while the 30 m² panoramic terrace transforms sunrise and sunset into a personal moment.

The Sunny Island Residence offers its residents a new standard of living, providing privacy, security, and a sense of upscale class - a home where the sea is not only visible but felt in every room.

It is a place for people who seek exclusivity, style, and long-term value.

A place you can call your home - and yet feel like it’s a privilege!

Fixture and fittings:
Each of the houses has its own courtyard, private entrance, and parking space, ensuring complete independence within the complex. Behind the exquisite façade lies uncompromising construction filled with attention to detail. The houses come with a built-in front door, an installed bell and intercom system, as well as video surveillance that guarantees additional security for you and your guests.

- Studio apartment with functional layout
- 41 m² living area
- 3rd floor with elevator
- Fully furnished and ready to move in

The apartment features a tastefully furnished living room with air conditioning - ideal for relaxing hours. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, microwave, dining table, and chairs - perfect for everyday life or vacation.

The first bedroom is furnished with a double bed and - like all rooms - has air conditioning. From here, you can access a large balcony with a view of the forest - perfect for restful mornings or quiet evenings.
The second bedroom also offers a double bed, spacious wardrobes, and access to another balcony area with garden furniture and a swing - ideal for relaxing with a view of nature.

Description of object:
For sale is a fully furnished two-room apartment in the well-maintained Diamond Bay complex, located in a quiet and green area of the popular resort town of Sunny Beach. The apartment is only approximately 450 meters from the beach, offering an ideal combination of tranquility and proximity to the seaside.

The apartment is situated in a modern building with an elevator and consists of a bright living room with a kitchenette, a bedroom, a bathroom with a shower, and a balcony. It is air-conditioned and offered including furniture and appliances - ready for immediate occupancy, whether for personal use or rental.

The Diamond Bay complex features well-maintained gardens, an outdoor swimming pool with a children's area and sunbathing zone, a reception desk, security services, parking facilities, and good connectivity to local infrastructure (supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, public transportation).

Thanks to its attractive location and functional layout, the property is excellent as a holiday home, for year-round living, or as an investment with rental potential.

Fixture and fittings:
Fully furnished and move-in ready

Living area with kitchenette

Built-in kitchen with electrical appliances (refrigerator, stove, extractor hood)

Air conditioning

Bedroom with double bed and wardrobe

Bathroom with shower and boiler

Balcony with seating area

Tiled floor in all rooms

PVC windows and exterior doors

Cable TV and internet connection prepared

Elevator in the building

Community pool with children's area

Well-maintained green spaces

Reception and security service

Parking (subject to availability)

Approximately 450 meters to the beach

Location:
The Diamond Bay complex is located in a quiet and green residential area of Sunny Beach, one of Bulgaria's most popular seaside resorts. The distance to the fine sandy beach is only about 450 meters, providing quick and convenient access to the sea.

In the immediate vicinity, you will find numerous amenities such as supermarkets, restaurants, cafés, pharmacies, and a bus stop - all within walking distance. Despite its central location, the complex is situated away from the tourist hustle and bustle, offering peace and relaxation.

The historic town of Nessebar, which is part of the UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just a few kilometers away and easily accessible by bus or car. Burgas Airport is approximately 30 km away and can be reached in about 30 minutes by car.

Thanks to its location, the property is ideally suited both as a holiday home and for permanent residence or rental purposes.

property_description:
Description of object:
**Elegance Inscribed in the Sea Horizon**

In the heart of the Akladi area in Chernomorets, just three minutes from the crystal-clear waters of the exotic Blue Flag awarded "Simple Beach" and Eco Camping Chernomorets, a world of tranquility, aesthetics, and exceptional quality of life unfolds - a boutique complex of single-family homes called "Sunny Island Residence."

We present to you the latest house, part of the boutique complex "Sunny Island Residence" - House No. 20.

This panoramic seaside property offers an area of 296 m² with a flexible and modern layout that combines functionality and style. The spacious living room with a separate dining area becomes the natural centerpiece of family coziness. The house features three separate bedrooms and three bathrooms, providing comfort and personal space for every family member. There is an impressive rooftop terrace of 91 m² - the perfect place to relax, share moments, and enjoy inspiring views of the sea and St. Ivan Island. The property has its own landscaped yard, the possibility to build a swimming pool, and a separate parking area that offers complete freedom both inside and outside. Safety is ensured through video surveillance and controlled access, guaranteeing your peace of mind.

The Sunny Island Residence offers its residents a new standard of living, providing privacy, security, and a sense of high class - a home where the sea is not only visible but felt in every room.

It is a place for those seeking exclusivity, style, and long-term value.

A place you can call your home - yet feel like it’s a privilege!

Fixture and fittings:
Quality is at the heart of the project - only materials of the highest class are used. The thermal insulation system "BAUCEM" ensures energy efficiency, the Austrian bricks "Wienerberger Porotherm" guarantee strength and durability, and the aluminum windows "ETEM" with triple glazing create an ideal microclimate in every room, regardless of the season.

This is not just a property. It is a new standard of living - with a touch of the sea, lightness, and a feeling of freedom that welcomes you right at your doorstep!

Location:
A location that makes no compromises

With a setting in close proximity to the VICTORIA SPA & Fitness (a year-round open five-star center), shops, restaurants, eco-trails, and well-maintained beaches, the Sunny Island Residence offers a unique combination of nature, amenities, and tranquility that is rarely found on the southern Black Sea coast.

Safety and Privacy

The complex is fenced and features controlled access and video surveillance, ensuring the safety of your family and property, whether you stay year-round or seasonally.

Miscellaneous:
Do you have any questions or would you like to schedule a viewing? Please feel free to contact us without obligation at the provided contact address.

From the investor with no commission!

We present to you a fully furnished studio for sale with a cozy terrace and beautiful view, located on the ground floor.

This 1-room apartment has a living area of 30.52 m² and is situated in the inner part of the complex - an excellent advantage for year-round use. The terrace, which is enclosed on all sides overlooking the garden, is a wonderful place to relax for those who love peace and privacy. The terrace can also be expanded to include an English courtyard.

The studio features several functional areas:
- Kitchen area,
- Relaxation area,
- An entrance hall that leads into the living area,
- A fully equipped bathroom with a shower.

The orientation of the studio is south-facing.

This studio is located next to the Green Paradise V Olympic Pool and the indoor pool, the restaurant, and parking facilities of the hotel.

Primorsko offers you excellent infrastructure with diverse shopping options, including supermarkets and small boutiques. Additionally, you will find fitness facilities nearby for an active lifestyle and a tranquil environment that invites relaxation. Public transport connections allow you to explore the surroundings conveniently. Leisure activities such as beach visits, water sports, and leisurely walks along the coast complete the offerings and make Primorsko a perfect place for your new property.

Fixture and fittings:
The furnishings of this apartment are consistently good and designed for the needs of modern lifestyles:

- Equipped kitchen,
- Sofa bed,
- Extra bed,
- Air conditioning unit for year-round comfort temperatures,  
- Practical shower and underfloor heating in the bathroom,
- Cozy private terrace for relaxing hours outdoors.

"Green Paradise II" - this is the second phase of the "The Green Paradise" complex - is located very close to "Green Paradise I" in the same picturesque and dense oak forest. This phase was put into operation in 2014. The buildings contain 73 apartments. Each building has an elevator. They consist of 5 above-ground floors and 1 basement, and between them are a swimming pool, a barbecue area, and a relaxation area with beautiful pavilions that protect you from the summer sun. On the first floor of Block A, there is a restaurant. The upper floors feature great apartments with spacious terraces. Under Block B, there is a gym. In the basement, there is a parking lot for cars with an automatic door.

The buildings are constructed from high-quality materials:
- The structure is monolithic,
- Walls - brick, with exterior thermal and sound insulation, and interior cement-lime plaster, gypsum filler, and latex,
- Windows - 5-chamber plastic windows,
- Flooring: common areas - granite tiles,
- Apartments - granite tiles and laminate flooring,
- Bathrooms - terracotta,
- Bathrooms: walls - ceramic tiles,
- Roof - ceramic tiles.

Location:
Primorsko is a lively coastal town that offers excellent infrastructure. Here, you will find numerous shopping options, including supermarkets and local shops that have everything for your daily needs. 

For your health, there is a nearby hospital that ensures quick medical assistance. 

The public transport connections make it easy for you to explore the surrounding regions comfortably. 

Additionally, Primorsko offers a variety of recreational activities, such as beach activities, water sports, and leisurely walks along the picturesque coast.

Miscellaneous:
This condominium is ideal for singles or couples who want to enjoy life by the coast. It is suitable as both a vacation apartment and for permanent use. Benefit from the peaceful surroundings and the numerous amenities in close proximity.

For sale is a spacious and fully furnished 2-room apartment in the sought-after "Silver Beach" complex in Byala, just 50 meters from the fine sandy beach.

The apartment is located on the ground floor (effectively raised ground floor) and offers an area of approximately 105 m² with the following layout:

Entrance area / Hallway

Modern bathroom with shower, toilet, and sink

Bright living room with open kitchen and dining area

Separate bedroom

Large terrace

The property is offered fully furnished and equipped with all necessary appliances - ready for personal use or as a lucrative investment for holiday rentals.

Direct beach location - only 50 m to the coast

Two outdoor pools with sun loungers

Recreation areas & well-maintained green spaces

Children's playground and sports area

24/7 security service with video surveillance

Parking spaces & underground garage

Restaurant & grocery store directly in the complex

The complex is located in a quiet area yet close to the urban infrastructure of Byala - ideal for long stays or relaxing vacations. Varna Airport is conveniently reachable in about 60 km.

This apartment combines a prime location in the first line to the sea, ample space and comfort, as well as the service and security of a modern holiday resort. Perfectly suited as a vacation home, seaside residence, or investment property with attractive rental prospects.

Description of object:
For sale: a two-story solid house with a large courtyard of 6,000 m² in a village near Elhovo. The property has a three-phase power connection, water, two wells, and an outbuilding. Internal repairs are required.

Fixture and fittings:
The house has a solid construction and is in need of renovation.

Location:
Elhovo - Small Town with Charm and History

Elhovo (Bulgarian: Елхово) is located in southeastern Bulgaria, on the banks of the Tundzha River, approximately 37 km south of Yambol and 94 km from Burgas. The town has around 8,500 residents and serves as the administrative center of the municipality of the same name.

Highlights:
- Historical roots dating back to Thracian and Roman times
- Attractions such as the Ethnographic Museum, the Church of St. Dimitar, and the Dolna Topchija Nature Reserve
- Quiet, green surroundings with fertile soil—ideal for agriculture and nature enthusiasts
- Good bus connections to Sofia, Yambol, Svishtov, and other cities
- Popular among expatriates and buyers of country houses and holiday properties.

Yambol Region - Culture, Nature, and Strategic Location

Yambol Province covers an area of about 4,400 km² and lies in the Thracian Lowland near the border with Turkey. The capital city, Yambol, has approximately 59,000 inhabitants and is rich in history and cultural heritage.

Features of the region:
- Historic sites such as the Thracian royal city Kabile and the ancient marketplace "Besisten”
- Fertile soils, a mild climate, and favorable conditions for agriculture
- Proximity to the Sofia-Burgas highway and the Turkish border (Lesovo border crossing)
- Diverse natural landscape with rivers, hills, and protected areas—ideal for ecotourism
- Growing infrastructure and investment potential, especially in rural areas.

property_description:
Description of object:
Victoria Casa is the newest project of the Victoria Residences complexes, located near the cities of Burgas and Pomorie, combining a sense of balance, harmony, and elegance in every detail. It is designed in a typical Mediterranean style and is situated amidst beautiful vineyards characteristic of the famous Pomorie wine region. With its expansive sea views opening to the east of the complex, the location invites dreaming.

Here is House E4 - a stylishly designed property that offers not just a home but a unique experience.

With a total area of 116 m² spread over two floors, featuring two spacious bedrooms, two elegant bathrooms, a walk-in closet, and a bright living room with an open-plan kitchen and veranda, this property combines modern comfort with a feeling of space and freedom.  
The houses in Victoria Casa are built in turnkey condition, tailored to the individual needs of each client. Each infrastructure project within Victoria Residences includes the construction of road networks, sidewalks, playgrounds, street and garden lighting, a substation, water supply system, sewage treatment plant, and sewerage. A modern and functional irrigation system will be installed for green space maintenance.

Construction of the complex is scheduled to be completed by October 2027.

Several houses with two and three bedrooms ranging from 116 to 157 m² are available for sale.  
We are happy to provide all information about the project upon request. Feel free to contact us!

Fixture and fittings:
Victoria Casa consists of 17 houses with private courtyards and parking spaces, as well as a communal pool. Custom interior solutions are possible during the construction process.

The houses are designed according to modern building standards and are constructed with monolithic reinforced concrete structures, electrical and plumbing installations, as well as modern water and thermal insulation.

Security is ensured through the implemented access control system.

A separate parking lot is available for guests' convenience.

The green areas are landscaped with rich and beautiful vegetation that complements the region's climate.

Location:
Proximity to the beach: The facility is located about 900 meters from the coast.

Pomorie: The charming coastal town with its well-known wineries and health resorts is only about 5 km away.

Burgas: The lively port city with an international airport, shopping centers, and cultural offerings can be reached in approximately 10 km.

Transport connections:
The proximity to the main road ensures convenient links to the surrounding towns and beaches.

Do you have any questions or would you like to arrange a viewing? Feel free to contact us without obligation using the contact information provided.

Description of object:
A NEW NEIGHBORHOOD with 16 luxury detached houses is being built in Pomorie.

Each house is two stories and has the following layout:

- First Floor - spacious living room with kitchen, bathroom with toilet, utility room for central heating, laundry room, garage with heated connection

- Second Floor - 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with toilets, one of which is a master bedroom with its own bathroom and toilet, 2 terraces.
The houses have a total built-up area ranging from 160 to 230 sqm, each with its own yard of 150 to 250 sqm.

Here is House 8 - your new home!

The beautiful property has the following layout:

Floor 1 - 69.92 sqm
- Living room with kitchen and dining area
- Utility room
- Bathroom
- Corridor

Floor 2 - 84.26 sqm
- Master bedroom with private bathroom
- Bedroom 1
- Bedroom 2
- Bathroom
- Corridor

The house is currently under construction, in the phase before Act 14. This means that the shell construction is almost complete. The building, including foundations, walls, and roof, has been finished. Currently, Act No. 14 is being issued to certify the completion of this phase. This is a key milestone because subsequent work includes installations, window frames, and cladding. The construction process follows the approved project and technical standards to ensure the stability and quality of the future home. The house is suitable for clients who wish to customize the interior at a later stage.

There are also other houses available for sale; please feel free to contact us for more information!

Fixture and fittings:
The houses are handed over with Act 16:

- House with a monolithic reinforced concrete structure, with finishing: floors - cement screed, walls and ceilings - gypsum plaster.
- Facade with thermal insulation and mineral plaster for energy efficiency.
- Electrical installation with installed switches and sockets.
- The plumbing system is completed up to the plug.
- Armored Hörmann front door included.
- German PVC carpentry providing thermal and sound insulation.
- Terraces with hydro- and thermal insulation, granite tiles, aluminum railings with brown glass.
- Fence made of concrete blocks and wrought iron for style and durability.
- Courtyard with stamped concrete floor and gardens with cast earth.
- Parking spaces available to owners.
- No maintenance fee.

Location:

Thanks to excellent accessibility and proximity to the town center, shopping facilities, infrastructure, and all the amenities for comfortable year-round living are available.

Pomorie - Spa Town with History and Healing Power on the Black Sea

Pomorie is a charming coastal town in Bulgaria, situated on a picturesque peninsula between Burgas and Nessebar. Known for its healing mud, mild climate, and proximity to Burgas International Airport, Pomorie ranks among the country's most popular mud and seaside resorts. The town offers a successful mix of relaxation, culture, and nature - with long sandy beaches, historical sights such as the "St. George” Monastery and Thracian tombs, as well as the unique Salt Museum.
Whether for investment, vacation, or health treatments - Pomorie combines tradition and modernity in an ideal location on Bulgaria's Black Sea coast.

Pomorie Beach: about 5 minutes on foot

Description of object:
We present to you this beautiful 2-room apartment with one bedroom and a terrace on the ground floor.

The apartment has an area of 67.64 m² and consists of:
- a bright living room with a kitchenette,
- a bedroom,
- a bathroom with a toilet,
- and a terrace, which is perfect for outdoor relaxation.

The ground-floor location offers convenient and quick access to the courtyard, making the apartment especially suitable for families with children.

The property is suitable for both personal use and rental purposes.

The building will be fully completed by summer 2026.

Fixture and fittings:
The apartment is part of a modern five-story building consisting of 14 functionally distributed units, designed to the highest standards.

High-quality materials and modern technologies are used in construction to ensure durability and energy efficiency.

Location:
Burgas - The Pearl of the Black Sea

Burgas, with approximately 189,000 inhabitants, is Bulgaria's fourth-largest city and the economic, cultural, and political center of the southeastern part of the country.
The city is picturesque, situated between the Black Sea and several lakes (including Burgas Lake, Mandra Lake, and Atanasov Lake), offering a mix of industry, tourism, and nature.

Highlights:
- Bulgaria's largest port
- Burgas International Airport
- Numerous festivals and cultural events
- Nature reserves and historical sites
- Popular destination for beach holidays and birdwatching

Kraimorie - Charming Coastal Neighborhood of Burgas

Kraimorie is a quiet district located about 10 km south of Burgas city center, directly on the Black Sea.
It has around 3,000 residents and is especially popular among families and summer vacationers.

Features:
- Shallow sandy beach with golden sand
- Small hotels, villas, and holiday homes
- Regular bus connection to the city center
- Ferry service to St. Anastasia Island
- Close to nature reserves such as Poda and Tschengene Skele
- Historical sites like the medieval Poros Fortress and St. George Monastery
- Camping site with an annual bikers' gathering

Kraimorie combines nature, history, and relaxation—ideal for those seeking peace by the sea but not wanting to be far from the city.

The Vineyards Resort & Spa Complex  
Vineyards Resort differs from typical holiday resorts, as it was built in the style of a cozy Bulgarian village, yet offers modern comfort and excellent infrastructure.

The complex is situated on a hill between Aheloy and the Black Sea, offering a magnificent panoramic view of the surrounding vineyards, mountains, and the sea. This special location creates an atmosphere of tranquility, spaciousness, and privacy.

Facilities & amenities of the resort:

- 2 swimming pools  
- 2 restaurants serving traditional Bulgarian cuisine  
- SPA center with massages, sauna, and hammam  
- Fitness room  
- Shops  
- Playground

Vineyards Resort combines nature, tranquility, and extensive infrastructure, making it ideal both as a holiday home and for year-round living.

Fixture and fittings:
Write-up

We offer you an attractive 2-room apartment in the exclusive Vineyards Resort & Spa, located between Aheloy and Kableshkovo in Bulgaria.
The apartment has a living area of 58 m² and is situated on the ground floor (parterre) with its own terrace.

Layout:

- Entrance area
- Living room with sofa bed, coffee table, sideboard, TV, air conditioning, integrated kitchen with washing machine, glass-ceramic cooktop, sink, microwave, breakfast bar & bar stools

The Vineyards Resort & Spa Complex
Vineyards Resort differs from typical holiday resorts because it is built in the style of a cozy Bulgarian village, yet offers modern comfort and excellent infrastructure.

The complex is located on a hill between Aheloy and the Black Sea and provides a breathtaking panoramic view of vineyards, mountains, and the sea. Its special location creates an atmosphere of tranquility, spaciousness, and privacy.

Vineyards Resort combines nature, tranquility, and extensive infrastructure, making it ideal both as a holiday apartment and for year-round living.

Aheloy is a small and quiet town on the Black Sea coast. It is located between the major holiday resorts of Sunny Beach and Pomorie, making it easy to reach lively places from here, but Aheloy itself remains calm and cozy. The town is known for its warm atmosphere, friendly people, and beautiful nature. There are no crowds of tourists here, but plenty of greenery, fresh air, clean sea, and a sense of comfort similar to that of a village. Aheloy is perfect for those who want to relax or live near the beach without the hustle and bustle of the city. Aheloy has everything needed for everyday life: shops, cafes, pharmacies, bus connections. Nearby, there are vineyards, fields, and hills, and the Aheloy River flows nearby. This place is chosen by those seeking peace, nature, and authentic Bulgaria—without noise and haste.

The distance to Burgas Airport is 19 km.
The distance to Varna Airport is 117 km.

Features of Sea Fort Club:

- Swimming pool
- Panoramic platform with sea view
- Well-kept green areas & peaceful living atmosphere

✔️ Ideal as a holiday home, permanent residence, or investment property with rental potential

For sale is a spacious 2-room apartment with 83 m² of living space in the popular holiday complex Sea Fort Club in Sveti Vlas. The property is located on the 2nd floor and impresses with a thoughtful layout as well as its excellent location within a large holiday resort.

Location:
The complex itself is located in an accessible area, on the main road Sonnenstrand - Elenite. On one side, it is surrounded by the sea, and on the other side by mountains. The Sea Fort Club is situated behind a beautiful beach called Robinson. The distance to the sea is only 250 meters. The bus stop with regular buses to Sunny Beach and Nessebar is 100 meters away. The Elenite water park is 1 km away. The most famous place in Sveti Vlas, Marina Dinevi Marina, is 2 km away. Everything you need for a good rest can be reached on foot. property_description:
Description of object:
For sea lovers and connoisseurs of breathtaking sunsets!

Access to your new house is directly from the street. There is a private courtyard enclosed by fences. The entrance to the residential building is designed for two cars. Climbing vegetation covers pergolas over the parking areas and along the fences that separate the courtyards.

The area of the three-story building is 218.1 m².

Behind the building, there are two parking spaces, a landscaped driveway, and an entry platform with bicycle parking spaces.  
On the first floor, there is an entrance hall with a staircase to the second floor and a storage room underneath, a storage room, a private bathroom, a kitchenette with a dining area, and a living room.

The veranda with the pool, an open area for sun loungers, and a barbecue area available as relaxation zones are located in the courtyard overlooking the sea.

On the second floor, there is a staircase and a corridor leading to two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and wardrobe, as well as a balcony. One of the bedrooms offers panoramic views of the sea.

The third floor features a corridor with two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and terraces; one of these terraces is a large panoramic terrace with sea views.

Your new property at a glance:

- Living area of 218 sqm,
- 4 bedrooms,
- 4 bathrooms with toilets,
- 3 terraces,
- Dressing room,
- Kitchen with dining area,
- Living room,
- Outdoor pool,
- 2 parking spaces,
- Unique sunsets.

The house is offered turnkey with Act 16 approval.

Fixture and fittings:
The developer team consists of highly qualified contractors and experts in the field of construction. The developer is certified according to the occupational health and safety system OHSAS 18001:2007, the quality management system ISO 9001:2015, and the environmental management system ISO 14001:2015.

During construction, only high-quality and modern materials and technologies are used, which are approved according to European standards.

Location:
Your new house is located in a new complex near the coast, in the Kraimorie residential area, which belongs to Burgas. With a total built-up area of 2,936 m², the complex features 14 single-family houses, whose perfect location makes them an ideal choice for a summer house by the sea in Burgas or for year-round living.

Near the complex, there are a school, a kindergarten, restaurants, and public transport stops. The houses are two-story and three-story buildings, each with its own separate garage or parking space with a capacity for two cars. On the ground floor of each house, there is a living room and a kitchen with a dining area, separated into corners, as well as a storage room and a bathroom with an entrance hall. Parking spaces are available in the southwestern enclosed courtyard.  
The courtyard where the house's pool is located is beautifully designed in tones that match the overall vision of the buildings.

The landscaping is natural—climbing vegetation on pergolas over the parking areas and on fences that separate the courtyards. The property is accessible via a street planned in the development detail plan towards the southwest and two pedestrian alleys.

Burgas - The Pearl of the Black Sea

Burgas has approximately 189,000 inhabitants and is Bulgaria’s fourth-largest city, serving as the economic, cultural, and political center of southeastern Bulgaria.  
The city is picturesque, situated between the Black Sea and several lakes (including Burgas Lake, Mandra Lake, Atanasovo Lake), offering a mix of industry, tourism, and nature.

Highlights:  
- Bulgaria’s largest port  
- Burgas International Airport  
- Numerous festivals and cultural events  
- Nature reserves and historic sites  
- A popular destination for beach holidays and birdwatching

Kraimorie - Charming Coastal District of Burgas

Kraimorie is a quiet neighborhood about 10 km south of downtown Burgas, directly on the Black Sea. It has around 3,000 residents and is especially popular among families and summer visitors.

Features:  
- Shallow sandy beach with golden sand  
- Small hotels, villas, and holiday homes  
- Regular bus connection to the city center  
- Boat connection to St. Anastasia Island  
- Close to nature reserves such as Poda and Tschengene Skele  
- Historic sites like the medieval Poros Fortress and St. George Monastery  
- Camping site with an annual biker gathering

Kraimorie combines nature, history, and relaxation—ideal for those seeking peace by the sea but not wanting to be far from urban amenities.

We offer you a well-maintained studio apartment in the Amoto Complex in Ravda. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor (out of a total of 3 floors) and impresses with its practical layout, fully furnished interior, and a balcony with a slight view of the pool.

Layout & Equipment

The studio has a living area of 38 m² and is fully furnished:

Entrance area

Living/sleeping room with integrated kitchen

Bathroom designed as a modern shower bath

Balcony with a slight view of the pool

Living area: 38 m²

Floor: 2nd of 3

Homeowners’ association fee / maintenance fee: EUR6 per m² per year

The Amoto Complex

The well-maintained complex offers its residents and guests:

Swimming pool with sunbathing area

Garden areas

Quiet residential location

Shopping facilities & restaurants nearby

Location

The Amoto Complex is situated in the popular seaside resort of Ravda, just a few kilometers from Nessebar (a UNESCO World Heritage site) and the holiday resort Sunny Beach. Ravda is characterized by a peaceful atmosphere, well-maintained beaches, and good infrastructure - ideal for both vacationers and permanent residents.

Beach: approximately 5-10 minutes walk

Nessebar: about 3 km

Sunny Beach: about 5 km

Burgas & international airport: approximately 25 km

In the vicinity, there are supermarkets, restaurants, cafés, pharmacies, and public transportation, making Ravda an enjoyable place to live year-round.

👉 This studio is perfect as a holiday apartment, secondary residence, or investment in a popular residential and holiday region on Bulgaria's Black Sea coast.

property_description:
Objektbeschreibung:
Wir freuen uns, Ihnen eine charmante 2-Zimmer-Wohnung mit Meerblick im beliebten Ferienort Sveti Vlas anbieten zu können. Die Wohnung befindet sich im modernen Anna Marina Komplex, nur wenige Schritte vom Strand entfernt, und bietet die perfekte Kombination aus Komfort, Ruhe und Nähe zur Infrastruktur.

Aufteilung der Wohnung:

Eingangsbereich

Helles Wohnzimmer mit integrierter Küche

Schlafzimmer

Badezimmer als Duschbad ausgelegt

Balkon mit herrlichem Meerblick

Der Anna Marina Komplex:

Der Anna Marina Komplex liegt in einem ruhigen und friedlichen Teil von Sveti Vlas, im beliebten Gebiet "Jurte", nur 200 Meter vom Strand entfernt. Die Anlage besteht aus zwei modernen, niedrigen Gebäuden, die jeweils mit einem Aufzug ausgestattet sind.

Ausstattung und Services:

Schwimmbad mit separatem Kinderbereich

Kostenlose, bequeme Liegestühle am Pool

Große Grünflächen zur Erholung

Poolbar

Spielplatz für Kinder

Ganzjährige Sicherheit

Parkplätze für Eigentümer und Gäste

Verwaltungsgesellschaft zur Betreuung der Gemeinschaftsflächen

Strand & Freizeitmöglichkeiten:

Der Strand ist nur 3 Gehminuten entfernt. Hier können Sie wählen zwischen:

einem kostenpflichtigen Bereich mit Liegen und Sonnenschirmen

einem sehr großen freien Strandabschnitt

Am Strand erwartet Sie ein breites Angebot an Wassersport und Unterhaltung wie Jetski, Bananenboot oder Parasailing für unvergessliche Urlaubserlebnisse.

Infrastruktur in der Nähe:

Ein besonderes Plus ist die Nähe zur gesamten Infrastruktur des Resorts:

Bushaltestelle (200 m) mit Verbindungen nach Sonnenstrand und Nessebar

Poliklinik und Apotheken

Supermarkt "Mercury" - bequem zu Fuß erreichbar

Ausstattung/Zubehör:
Wir freuen uns, Ihnen eine charmante 2-Zimmer-Wohnung mit Meerblick im modernen Anna Marina Komplex in Sveti Vlas anbieten zu können. Nur wenige Schritte vom Strand entfernt, vereint diese Immobilie Komfort, Ruhe und Nähe zur Infrastruktur.

Aufteilung & Einrichtung

Eingangsbereich mit Garderobe und Schuhschrank

Wohnzimmer mit Couch, Schlafcouch, Esstisch, Stühlen und TV

Integrierte, dennoch abgetrennte Küche mit Waschmaschine, Cerankochfeld und Spülbecken

Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett und Nachttischen

Badezimmer als Duschbad ausgelegt

Balkon mit herrlichem Meerblick

Der Anna Marina Komplex

Ruhige Lage im beliebten Gebiet "Jurte" von Sveti Vlas

Nur 200 Meter vom Strand entfernt

Zwei moderne Gebäude, beide mit Aufzug

Ausstattung & Services

Schwimmbad mit separatem Kinderbereich

Kostenlose, bequeme Liegestühle am Pool

Große Grünflächen zur Erholung

Poolbar

Spielplatz für Kinder

Ganzjährige Sicherheit

Parkplätze für Eigentümer und Gäste

Verwaltungsgesellschaft für die Betreuung der Gemeinschaftsflächen

Strand & Freizeitmöglichkeiten

3 Gehminuten zum Strand

Wahl zwischen kostenpflichtigem Bereich (Liegen & Sonnenschirme) oder großem freien Strandabschnitt

Wassersportangebote wie Jetski, Bananenboot, Parasailing. 

Infrastruktur in der Nähe

Bushaltestelle (200 m) mit Verbindungen nach Sonnenstrand & Nessebar

Lage Haus/Grundstück:
Der Anna Marina Komplex liegt im beliebten Ferienort Sveti Vlas, im ruhigen Wohn- und Erholungsgebiet "Jurte", nur ca. 200 Meter vom Strand entfernt.

Lagevorteile des Anna Marina Komplexes:

Strandnähe - nur 3 Gehminuten bis zum feinsandigen Strand, mit kostenpflichtigen Bereichen (Liegen & Schirme) und großen freien Abschnitten.

Ruhige Umgebung - etwas abseits des touristischen Trubels, ideal für Erholung und ganzjähriges Wohnen.

Umfassende Infrastruktur - in unmittelbarer Nähe befinden sich:

Supermarkt "Mercury"

Apotheken und eine Poliklinik

Restaurants, Bars und kleinere Geschäfte

Gute Verkehrsanbindung - Bushaltestelle nur 200 m entfernt, mit regelmäßigen Verbindungen nach:

Sonnenstrand (Sunny Beach) - größter Ferienort Bulgariens

Nessebar - UNESCO-Weltkulturerbe mit historischer Altstadt

Nähe zum Yachthafen Marina Dinevi - ca. 15-20 Gehminuten entfernt, mit exklusiven Restaurants, Cafés und Bars.

Flughafen Burgas - in ca. 30 Minuten mit dem Auto erreichbar.

👉 Damit bietet der Anna Marina Komplex eine perfekte Kombination aus Ruhe, Meerblick und zentraler Infrastruktur.

Description of object:
This well-equipped 2-room apartment in the popular complex "Raduga 1" offers a beautiful mountain view from the 5th floor. With an annual rent of only EUR450 and a purchase price of EUR95,500, it is ideal for a peaceful retreat in Bulgaria. Perfect for permanent residence or as a holiday apartment.

Fixture and fittings:
The bedroom is equipped with a comfortable bed and offers direct access to the balcony, which invites you to relax with comfortable chairs and a sofa corner. The living area is cozy and includes a sofa as well as chairs for lingering. The well-equipped kitchen provides plenty of space for your cooking needs and is fitted with all necessary appliances. The bathroom is modern and functional.

Location:
The residential complex "Raduga 1" in Sveti Vlas is a modern and well-maintained development that is perfect for those seeking peace and nature, yet still close to amenities and entertainment. Sveti Vlas is a popular holiday destination on the Bulgarian Black Sea coast, known for its breathtaking mountains and clear waters. The location offers a perfect mix of tranquility and proximity to livelier tourist centers such as Nessebar and Sunny Beach. For nature lovers, the area around Sveti Vlas is a true paradise - with beautiful hiking trails and stunning views of the Black Sea and the surrounding mountains.

Miscellaneous:
Do you have questions about this property or would you like to schedule a viewing? Feel free to contact us without obligation using the provided contact details.

Description of object:
We are pleased to offer you a cozy 2-room apartment in the Stella Polaris complex in the popular holiday resort of Sunny Beach. The apartment is located on the 6th floor (out of 6) and offers a functional layout over 48 m² of living space, as well as a balcony with a beautiful distant view.

Apartment Layout:

- Living room with integrated kitchen
- Bedroom
- Bathroom designed as a shower bath
- Balcony with distant view

Key Data:

- Living area: 48 m²
- Floor: 6th upper floor / Attic
- Orientation: Bright, with a view

The Stella Polaris Complex:

The Stella Polaris complex is situated in one of the quietest and greenest areas of Sunny Beach, just about 500 meters from the beach. The gated residential community offers an appealing combination of relaxation, security, and comfort.

Features and Benefits:

- Gated, well-maintained development
- Swimming pool with sunbathing area (optional)
- Quiet, green location
- Close to the beach (about 5-7 minutes on foot)

Management & Services for Owners:

Location & Infrastructure:

In immediate proximity, you will find everything necessary for daily life or a relaxing holiday:

- Restaurants, cafés, and bars
- Supermarkets and shopping facilities
- Seaside promenade with numerous leisure activities
- Pharmacies, banks, and medical services

Good transport links to Nessebar, Ravda, and Burgas (Sarafovo Airport approximately 30 km away)

Fixture and fittings:
We are pleased to offer you a cozy 2-room apartment in the popular Stella Polaris complex in Sunny Beach. The apartment is located on the 6th floor (out of 6) and provides a practical layout over 48 m² of living space, as well as a balcony with a beautiful distant view.

- Living room with sofa, coffee table, and cabinets
- Integrated kitchen with washing machine, cooktop, and sink
- Bedroom with double bed and wardrobe
- Bathroom designed as a shower bathroom
- Balcony with stunning distant view

- Living area: 48 m²

The Stella Polaris complex

The complex is situated in one of the quietest and greenest areas of Sunny Beach, approximately 500 meters from the beach. The gated community offers ideal conditions for relaxation, security, and comfort.

Features and advantages:

- Gated, well-maintained complex
- Swimming pool with sunbathing area (optional)
- Quiet, green location
- Close to the beach - about 5-7 minutes walk

Management & services for owners

Location & infrastructure

In the immediate vicinity, you will find:

- Restaurants, cafés, and bars
- Supermarkets & shopping options
- Seaside promenade with leisure and entertainment offerings
- Pharmacies, banks, and medical services

Good transport connections to Nessebar, Ravda, and Burgas (Sarafovo Airport about 30 km away)

Location:
The area of the complex is rich in vegetation, with a large number of trees and shrubs. A river flows near the complex, and nearby there are sand dunes protected by UNESCO. Within walking distance, there are pharmacies, restaurants, cafés, vegetable markets, shops of various themes, and everything necessary for a comfortable pastime. The ancient city of Nessebar is 2 km away, as is the center of Sunny Beach. The beach is 500 meters away, featuring clear sea and a wide strip of shoreline with both paid and free recreational areas, a variety of water activities, restaurants, and cozy bars that will provide you with a wonderful and unforgettable vacation. "Stella Polaris" is a complex where you can relax from the hustle and bustle of the big city or live there year-round.

Description of object:
We are pleased to present you with a comfortable 3-room apartment with sea views in the popular Melia complex in Ravda.

Property Details:

- Living Area: 59.29 m²
- Total Area: 85.80 m²
- Floor: 5th of 5, with elevator
- Rooms: Living room, separate kitchen, 2 bedrooms, bathroom (shower room)
- 3 balconies with beautiful views

Features & Layout:

The apartment features a bright living room with access to a balcony, a kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom with a shower, and three balconies offering wonderful views, including sea views.

The Melia Complex:

The complex is a gated community accessible only to owners and guests. Together with the Melia 1 complex, it shares well-maintained, landscaped grounds that offer the following amenities:

- Swimming pool with children's area
- Relaxation and sunbathing area with modern loungers
- Children's playground meeting all safety standards
- Restaurant and reception
- Security and video surveillance
- Management company that takes care of the property year-round

Location:

Ravda is a family-friendly resort town, especially popular among parents with young children. It offers tranquility and relaxation without sacrificing amenities. The beach is only 250 meters away and features water slides as well as cozy restaurants.

The center of Ravda, with restaurants, cafes, shops, and entertainment options, is within walking distance. There is also a park with playgrounds nearby. A bus stop is accessible on foot, providing regular connections to Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas.

Fixture and fittings:
We are pleased to present to you an attractive and comfortable 3-room apartment with sea view in the popular Melia complex in Ravda.

🏠 Property Details

Living area: 59.29 m²

Total area: 85.80 m²

Floor: 5th of 5, easily accessible by elevator

Rooms:

- Living room with sofa, wardrobe, TV, and access to the balcony
- Separate kitchen with appliances
- 2 bedrooms: one with a double bed, the other with 2 single beds - both with balconies
- Modern bathroom equipped as a shower bath

3 balconies offering beautiful views, including sea view

✨ Features & Layout

The apartment impresses with its bright interior design and practical layout. In addition to the spacious living room with balcony access, it features a fully equipped kitchen, two cozy bedrooms each with their own balcony, and a modern bathroom. The total of 3 balconies is a real highlight, providing both stunning views and a pleasant retreat space.

🏢 The Melia Complex

The residential area is a gated community accessible only to owners and guests. Together with the neighboring Melia 1, it shares well-maintained green grounds that offer many amenities:

- Swimming pool with children's area
- Relaxation and sunbathing area with modern loungers
- Children's playground built to the highest safety standards
- Restaurant and reception
- Security and video surveillance
- Management company responsible for year-round maintenance of the complex

📍 Location

Ravda is a peaceful and family-friendly resort town, especially popular among parents with children. The fine sandy beach is only 250 meters away and offers water slides as well as cozy restaurants right by the sea.

The center of Ravda, with restaurants, cafés, shops, and entertainment options, is within walking distance. There is also a park with playgrounds nearby. Thanks to a bus stop within walking distance, Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas are quickly and conveniently accessible.

Location:
The facility is located near the center, just a few minutes' walk away from restaurants, cafes, entertainment options, various shops, and a hiking park with playgrounds. The distance to the beach is only 250 meters. At the beach, you can enjoy water slides and have a delicious lunch at cozy restaurants. A public transportation stop is just a few minutes' walk from the property, with regular buses to Nessebar, Sunny Beach, and Burgas. One of the most famous Aqua Paradise water parks is located 1 km from Meliá 2. Ravda has one of the few surf schools along the coast, as Ravda offers ideal conditions for this sport. "Meliá 2" is a combination of coziness and comfort, providing excellent conditions for summer holidays or year-round stays.

The distance to Burgas Airport is 22 km.
The distance to Varna Airport is 107 km.

Miscellaneous:
Do you have questions about this property or would you like to schedule a viewing? Feel free to contact us without obligation using the contact details provided.

Balcony - with pleasant views and plenty of natural light

Three large swimming pools with separate children's area

About the complex - Sunset Resort Pomorie

Sunset Resort is the largest and most spectacular project on Bulgaria's Black Sea coast - a 5-star resort consisting of several buildings and apartment sections. The architecture impresses with its elegance and grandeur, while the highest construction quality is guaranteed.

The complex includes 5 luxurious residential buildings with different floors as well as 6 exclusive villas.

Ideal as a holiday property, investment opportunity or secondary residence

- Bedroom

- Balcony with distant sea view  

Living area: Spacious and functionally designed

Construction & Equipment: High-quality materials, elegant finish

About the Complex - Sunset Resort Pomorie:

Sunset Resort is one of the largest and most spectacular projects on Bulgaria's Black Sea coast.  

- 5 luxury residential buildings with different floors  
- 6 exclusive villas  
- 5-star service quality and impressive architecture  

Facilities & Services at the Resort:  

- 4 large outdoor pools with children's areas, water park, and water attractions  
- River-shaped pool, sunbathing and relaxation zones (approx. 3,500 m² pool area)  
- 9 restaurants offering international cuisine (Italian, Bulgarian, Asian, French, fish restaurant, grill, etc.)  
- Beautiful landscaped gardens with walking paths, fountains, flower beds, and exotic plants

Location:
Within the complex's territory, there are 4 swimming pools with children's entertainment, such as: a water park and various water attractions, a river-shaped swimming pool, a sunbathing and relaxation area—all spread over an area of 3,500 square meters. The complex features 9 restaurants offering different cuisines: Italian, Bulgarian, Asian, French, seafood, and grill restaurant—appealing even to the most finicky guests. The grounds of the complex are lushly landscaped, with walkways, fountains, relaxation spots, flowerbeds with exotic plants, and nighttime lighting that create a comfortable and inviting atmosphere. The stylish spa center is located in a building called Sigma. On-site facilities for guests and owners include an indoor pool, Turkish bath, Finnish sauna, steam room, whirlpool, beauty salon, and various types of massages. For sports enthusiasts, there are numerous services: a fitness room, water aerobics, and aerobics classes. For children, there are various entertainment programs as well as a babysitting room. The complex also has several conference halls, one designed for 472 people. It features a medical clinic, bowling alley, bars, shops, currency exchange office, internet room, open parking lots, and an underground garage. The wide range of services and entertainment options at Sunset Resort makes it unique and unparalleled. The beach is only 20 meters away—a broad strip of sand with clear sea water—perfect for a wonderful holiday. Opposite the complex is one of the largest water parks called "Sunset Aquapark Pomorie." Supermarkets, pharmacies, grocery stores, and all city infrastructure are within walking distance. A vast amount of greenery, sea breeze, crystal-clear air—all these will be offered by Sunset Resort.

the distance to Varna Airport is 120 km.

Water sports such as surfing, windsurfing, and motor jets are available for enthusiasts. Not far from the complex, there is an ecologically clean river that is a popular spot for anglers. Pomorie is one of the best places for balneological tourism thanks to its healing mud, located 9 km away.

Due to its proximity to the Black Sea coast and the Sunny Beach resort, Aheloy is becoming an increasingly attractive destination for tourism. Currently, several hotels, restaurants, and bars operate within the town of Aheloy. Aheloy is connected directly to Burgas and the airport by regular bus lines and minibusses.

Aheloy is a place for people who love peaceful and moderate seaside relaxation. "Marina Cape" offers fresh air, tranquility, peace, solitude with nature—an ideal option both for a wonderful vacation and for year-round living.

Negresco is located in Elenite, about 800 meters from the clean, wide seashore.
